&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;march-7-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-march-7-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;March 7, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to March 7, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#march-7-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;updated-developers-terms&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-updated-developers-terms&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Updated Developers Terms&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Updated Developers Terms&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#updated-developers-terms&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;With the API officially out of beta, Notion has updated our developer terms of service as of March 1st, 2022. View our updated terms &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.notion.so/notion/Developer-Terms-ba4131408d0844e08330da2cbb225c20&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;february-14-2022---28-2022-block-by-block-edition&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-february-14-2022-28-2022-block-by-block-edition&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;February 14, 2022 - 28, 2022: Block by Block edition!&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to February 14, 2022 - 28, 2022: Block by Block edition!&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#february-14-2022---28-2022-block-by-block-edition&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;The API is officially out of beta!&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;Read more about it &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.notion.so/blog/api-ga&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;features-7&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-features&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Features&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Features&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#features-7&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We now have a &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/page/notion-platform-roadmap&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;roadmap&lt;/a&gt;, so you have a better sense of what we&amp;#x27;ll be building next.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We released a new version of the API, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-02-22&lt;/code&gt;. This version makes our requests and responses more consistent across properties, blocks, and filters, and officially deprecates the list databases endpoint. Read more &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/changelog/releasing-notion-version-2022-02-22&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We now show the public API status independently of Notion&amp;#x27;s status on &lt;a href=&quot;https://status.notion.so/&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;https://status.notion.so/&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Added &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;created_by&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;edited_by&lt;/code&gt; to pages, blocks, and databases, and added &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;archived&lt;/code&gt; to databases. Read more &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/changelog/created-by-and-last-edited-by-properties-in-block-page-and-database-objects&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Added new ways for admins of Enterprise workspaces to view and control the integrations installed in their workspaces. Read more &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.notion.so/help/add-and-manage-integrations-with-the-api&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Added more information to paginated responses to make it easier to fetch complete responses for complex property types. Read more &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/pagination&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-7&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-7&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where pages and databases with archived (i.e. trashed) ancestors would show &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;archived: false&lt;/code&gt;. They now show &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;archived: true&lt;/code&gt; because they are, in fact, archived.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Improved API performance when rendering users who are members in the space. This affects all user, block, and page-related endpoints since users can be mentioned in both page properties and rich text.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Added a message about sharing relevant pages and databases with a bot in the 404 not found error message. We found that this was one of the more common reasons for API users to get a 404 when calling the API.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where bots could be given a more restrictive &amp;quot;Can edit content&amp;quot; access on child databases, which prevented some bots with write access from being able to update the database schema. &lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where user mentions failed with &amp;quot;user not found&amp;quot; when creating new blocks, even if those users should have been visible to the bot.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where malformed properties in a single page would cause an entire request to the query database endpoint to fail.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where it was possible to update a page/database in the trash. Attempting to update a trashed page or database now returns a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug in the get page property endpoint where retrieving a rollup property which referenced a relation containing pages the bot did not have access to skipped those pages and returned an incorrect result. We now return a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug in the get page property endpoint where retrieving a formula property whose depth exceeds what we can compute in the API simply returned the wrong value. We now return a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;march-1-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-march-1-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;March 1, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to March 1, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#march-1-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;

Both properties are &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/user&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;user objects&lt;/a&gt; which will contain¬†&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;object&lt;/code&gt;¬†and¬†&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;id&lt;/code&gt; keys. &lt;p&gt;We have also added a boolean &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;archived&lt;/code&gt; property for &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;database objects&lt;/a&gt; to denote if the database has been deleted. You can use the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;archived&lt;/code&gt; property to archive or unarchive a database and its descendants when &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/update-a-database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;updating the database&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;february-25-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-february-25-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;February 25, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to February 25, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#february-25-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;releasing-notion-version-2022-02-22&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-releasing-notion-version-2022-02-22&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Releasing Notion-Version 2022-02-22&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Releasing Notion-Version 2022-02-22&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#releasing-notion-version-2022-02-22&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Notion&amp;#x27;s API versions&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;As a reminder, we only version backwards incompatible changes, so generally, you still get access to new features we release on the API without needing to upgrade. You can use different version headers for each request, so you can upgrade incrementally to get to the latest version.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;re releasing Notion-Version &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2022-02-22&lt;/code&gt; with the following &lt;em&gt;backwards incompatible&lt;/em&gt; changes:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; in blocks has been renamed to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;, to be consistent with the database property type. &lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Query database filter changes:
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; are no longer supported in query database filters when filtering by &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone_number&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; properties. Use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone_number&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; instead.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rollup&lt;/code&gt; query database filters no longer accept the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; keyword. Use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; instead.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;formula&lt;/code&gt; query database filters no longer accept the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; keyword. Use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;string&lt;/code&gt; instead.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;property_item&lt;/code&gt; objects now return a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;type&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;next_url&lt;/code&gt;, and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;id&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Deprecated the List Databases API endpoint.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;the-text-property-in-content-blocks-has-been-renamed-to-rich_text&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-the-text-property-in-content-blocks-has-been-renamed-to-rich-text&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;The &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; property in content blocks has been renamed to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to The &quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#the-text-property-in-content-blocks-has-been-renamed-to-rich_text&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;To be consistent with the database property type, we have renamed the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; property to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;. This affects the following block types: &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;paragraph&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;heading_1&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;heading_2&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;heading_3&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;callout&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;quote&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;bulleted_list_item&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;numbered_list_item&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;to_do&lt;/code&gt; ,&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;toggle&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;code&lt;/code&gt; ,&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;template&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Here is an example of the previous &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; property:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Previous paragraph block&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Previous paragraph block&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;,
  //...other keys excluded
  &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [{
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Lacinato kale&amp;quot;,
        &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
      }
    }]
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Here is an example of the updated &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; property:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;Updated paragraph block&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;Updated paragraph block&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;,
  //...other keys excluded
  &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;: [{
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Lacinato kale&amp;quot;,
        &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
      }
    }]
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;query-database-filter-changes&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-query-database-filter-changes&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Query database filter changes&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Query database filter changes&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#query-database-filter-changes&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; no longer supported&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Version 2022-02-22 no longer supports &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; property filters in the query database endpoint. For consistency with the database property types, use &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone_number&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; instead when filtering on &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;phone_number&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; properties.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;More concretely, this query database filter will throw a validation error:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;and&amp;quot;: [
			{
				&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Phone number&amp;quot;,
				&amp;quot;phone&amp;quot;: {
					&amp;quot;equals&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;1112223333&amp;quot;
				}
			}
		]
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;This query database filter will succeed:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;and&amp;quot;: [
			{
				&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Phone number&amp;quot;,
				&amp;quot;phone_number&amp;quot;: {
					&amp;quot;equals&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;1112223333&amp;quot;
				}
			}
		]
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rollup&lt;/code&gt; property filters accept &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; instead of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Rollup property filters must now be constructed with the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt; keyword instead of the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; keyword if the value of the rollup is an array of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;. Put concretely, if a page&amp;#x27;s rollup property is rendered like so:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;rollup property&amp;quot;: {
	&amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;~%5Bw%5C&amp;quot;,
	&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;,
	&amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;array&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;array&amp;quot;: [
			{
				&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;,
				&amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;: [
					{
						&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
						&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
							&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text 2&amp;quot;,
							&amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
						},
						&amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
							&amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: true,
							&amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;red&amp;quot;
						},
						&amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text 2&amp;quot;,
						&amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
					}
				]
			},
			{
				&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;,
				&amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;: [
					{
						&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
						&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
							&amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;another text&amp;quot;,
							&amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
						},
						&amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
							&amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
							&amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
						},
						&amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;another text&amp;quot;,
						&amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
					}
				]
			}
		],
		&amp;quot;function&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;show_original&amp;quot;
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;This filter will no longer work in version 2022-02-22:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rollup property&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;: {
			&amp;quot;any&amp;quot;: {
				&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
					&amp;quot;contains&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text&amp;quot;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Instead, write:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rollup property&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;: {
			&amp;quot;any&amp;quot;: {
				&amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;: {
					&amp;quot;contains&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text&amp;quot;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;formula&lt;/code&gt; property filters accept &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;string&lt;/code&gt; instead of &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Rollup property filters must now be constructed with the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;string&lt;/code&gt; keyword instead of the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;text&lt;/code&gt; keyword if the value of the formula is a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;string&lt;/code&gt;. Put concretely, if a page&amp;#x27;s formula property is rendered like so:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;formula property&amp;quot;: {
	&amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;m%5D%3F%5C&amp;quot;,
	&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;,
	&amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;string&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;string&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text 2,another text&amp;quot;
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;This filter will no longer work in version 2022-02-22:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;formula property&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;: {
			&amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
				&amp;quot;contains&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text&amp;quot;
			}
		}
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Instead, write this:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;formula property&amp;quot;,
		&amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;: {
			&amp;quot;string&amp;quot;: {
				&amp;quot;contains&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;update text&amp;quot;
			}
		}
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;property-list-items-now-have-types&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-property-list-items-now-have-types&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Property list items now have types&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Property list items now have types&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#property-list-items-now-have-types&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Property item lists now always have type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;property_item&lt;/code&gt;. Rollup aggregations are now returned inside that type. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;ve also added the property &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;id&lt;/code&gt; field and the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;next_url&lt;/code&gt; to fetch the next set of property items.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Here is an example of a previous &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rollup&lt;/code&gt; &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;property_item&lt;/code&gt; list:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
    {
      &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;83f92c9d-523d-466e-8c1f-9bc2c25a99fe&amp;quot;
      }
    },
 		...
  ],
  &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some-next-cursor-value&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: true,
  &amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;date&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;date&amp;quot;: {
      &amp;quot;start&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-07T14:42:00.000+00:00&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;end&amp;quot;: null
    },
    &amp;quot;function&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;latest_date&amp;quot;
  },
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Here is an example of the updated &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rollup&lt;/code&gt; &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;property_item&lt;/code&gt; list:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
    {
      &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;xYz890&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;83f92c9d-523d-466e-8c1f-9bc2c25a99fe&amp;quot;
      }
    },
 		...
  ],
  &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some-next-cursor-value&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: true,
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;aBcD123&amp;quot;
    &amp;quot;next_url&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;https://api.notion.com/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/aBcD123?start_cursor=some-next-cursor-value&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;rollup&amp;quot;: {
    	&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;date&amp;quot;,
    	&amp;quot;date&amp;quot;: {
      	&amp;quot;start&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-07T14:42:00.000+00:00&amp;quot;,
      	&amp;quot;end&amp;quot;: null
    	},
    	&amp;quot;function&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;latest_date&amp;quot;
		}
  },
  
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Deprecated the List Databases endpoint&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Deprecated the List Databases endpoint&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;List all &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Databases&lt;/a&gt; endpoint is removed starting in this version. You can use the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/post-search&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Search API&lt;/a&gt; for this functionality instead. The List Databases endpoint only returns explicitly shared databases, while search will also return child pages and databases within explicitly shared pages.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;january-31-2022---february-13-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-january-31-2022-february-13-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#january-31-2022---february-13-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;re trying something new&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;re experimenting with publishing biweekly changelogs in addition to our existing changelogs about new features. The biweekly changelogs will include bug fixes and improvements that are not big enough to justify their own changelog entry.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;The timing may be somewhat irregular until we smooth the process out, but we hope to align on a regular schedule soon. This is our first regular changelog entry; we hope you find it useful.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We added an optimization for search when filtering by pages or databases. This should particularly help latency when using search to power a database picker in a large workspace. For more details about search and how to optimize search requests, see the &lt;a href=&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/post-search&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;search documentation&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;We fixed an issue where fetching an embed block containing an uploaded file returned the wrong file URL.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;january-25-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-january-25-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;January 25, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to January 25, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#january-25-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Caption property is now supported for code block type&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Caption property is now supported for code block type&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding, updating, and retrieving the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;caption&lt;/code&gt; property for &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;code&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example response from &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;append block children&lt;/a&gt; containing a code block, with a caption, uploaded to Notion.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block-id&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;has_children&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;archived&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;caption&amp;quot;: [
                    {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Hello Caption!&amp;quot;,
                            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
                        },
                        &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
                        },
                        &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Hello Caption!&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
                    }
                ],
                &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                    {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;const foo = \&amp;quot;bar\&amp;quot;&amp;quot;,
                            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
                        },
                        &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
                        },
                        &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;const foo = \&amp;quot;bar\&amp;quot;&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
                    }
                ],
                &amp;quot;language&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;javascript&amp;quot;
            }
        },
    ],
    &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: null,
    &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: false
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;january-5-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-january-5-2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;January 5, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to January 5, 2022&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#january-5-2022&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for simple tables in the API.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Simple tables and simple table rows&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Simple tables and simple table rows&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Tables are parent blocks for table row children. They can only contain children of type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table_row&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When creating a table block via the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; endpoint, the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table&lt;/code&gt; must have at least 1 &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table_row&lt;/code&gt; whose &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;cells&lt;/code&gt; array has the same length as the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table_width&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;To fetch content for a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table&lt;/code&gt;, fetch the the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table_row&lt;/code&gt; children via &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/get-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve block children&lt;/a&gt;. The &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;table&lt;/code&gt; block itself only contains formatting data, no content.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Table block example:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
	&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;table&amp;quot;,
	&amp;quot;table&amp;quot;: {
		&amp;quot;table_width&amp;quot;: 3,
		&amp;quot;has_column_header&amp;quot;: false,
		&amp;quot;has_row_header&amp;quot;: false
	}
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Table row block example:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;table_row&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;table_row&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;cells&amp;quot;: [
      [
        {
          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 1 content&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
          },
          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
          },
          &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 1 content&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
        }
      ],
      [
        {
          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 2 content&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
          },
          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
          },
          &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 2 content&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
        }
      ],
      [
        {
          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 3 content&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
          },
          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
          },
          &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 3 content&amp;quot;,
          &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
        }
      ]
    ]
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For more details, refer to the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/block&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Block object&lt;/a&gt; docs.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;december-15-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-december-15-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;December 15, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to December 15, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#december-15-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Both public and internal integrations now support having more granular capabilities, which enforce what an integration can do and see in a Notion workspace. These capabilities when put together enforce which API endpoints an integration can call, and what content and user related information they are able to see. For further information on capabilities and best practices, see the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/capabilities&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;capabilities reference&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;content-capabilities&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-content-capabilities&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Content capabilities&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Content capabilities&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#content-capabilities&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Integrations can have any combination of read content, insert content, or update content capabilities.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;strong&gt;read content&lt;/strong&gt; capability gives the integration access to read existing content in a Notion workspace.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;strong&gt;insert content&lt;/strong&gt; capability gives the integration permission to create new content in a Notion workspace.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The &lt;strong&gt;update content&lt;/strong&gt; capability gives the integration permission to update existing content in a Notion workspace.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;user-capabilities&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-user-capabilities&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;User capabilities&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to User capabilities&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#user-capabilities&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Integrations have different levels of user capabilities, which affect how &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/user&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;user objects&lt;/a&gt; are returned from the Notion API:&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;No user information - the integration will not be able to request any information about users. User objects will not include information about the user, including name, profile images, or their email address.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;User information without email addresses - user objects will include other information about the user, including their name or profile images, but omit the email address.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;User information with email addresses - user objects will include all information about the user, including name, profile images, and their email address.&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;limitations&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-limitations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Limitations&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Limitations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#limitations&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;An installed integration can never capabilities will never supersede the capabilities of the user who owns the integration. For example, an integration cannot insert or update on a page if the owner has read-only access.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;existing-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-existing-integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Existing integrations&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Existing integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#existing-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;All existing integrations will continue to have the same functionality as before. Any integrations created before December 15, 2021 automatically will have all content capabilities, and user capabilities that give access to user information including email addresses.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;updating-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-updating-integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Updating integrations&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Updating integrations&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#updating-integrations&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Update the capabilities on an existing integration through &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.notion.so/my-integrations&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;https://www.notion.so/my-integrations&lt;/a&gt;. After updating a public integration&amp;#x27;s capabilities, users will need to re-authenticate with the integration to apply the new capabilities to their installation. After re-authenticating a public integration with changed capabilities, or updating an internal integration with changed capabilities, the new capabilities will apply to all pages already shared with the integration. For more information on setting capabilities see the &lt;a href=&quot;/docs/authorization&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot; class=&quot;doc-link&quot; data-sidebar=&quot;authorization&quot;&gt;Authorization&lt;/a&gt; guide.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;december-14-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-december-14-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;December 14, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to December 14, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#december-14-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;time-zone-support&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-time-zone-support&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Time zone support&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Time zone support&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#time-zone-support&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added an optional &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;time_zone&lt;/code&gt; field (based on the &lt;a href=&quot;https://www.iana.org/time-zones&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;IANA database&lt;/a&gt; time zone values) to the Date objects. Developers can now explicitly set the time zones of Date property values using the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;time_zone&lt;/code&gt; field. Once this property is set explicitly, users will be able to see the same time zone in the app. When time zone information is provided in this method, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;start&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;end&lt;/code&gt; cannot contain &lt;a href=&quot;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTC_offset&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;UTC offset&lt;/a&gt;s. In addition when time zone information is provided in dates, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;start&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;end&lt;/code&gt; cannot be dates without time information (i.e. &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;2020-12-08&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt;).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The public API will always return the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;time_zone&lt;/code&gt; field as &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;null&lt;/code&gt; when rendering dates and time zone will be displayed as a &lt;a href=&quot;https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTC_offset&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;UTC offset&lt;/a&gt; in the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;start&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;end&lt;/code&gt; date fields.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;november-17-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-november-17-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;November 17, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to November 17, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#november-17-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Synced Block, Link to Page and Template block types are now supported in the API&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Synced Block, Link to Page and Template block types are now supported in the API&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding and retrieving &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_to_page&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;template&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;synced_block-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-synced-block-block-type&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; block type&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to [object Object]&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#synced_block-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Similar to the UI, there are two versions of a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; -- the original block that was created first and doesn&amp;#x27;t yet sync with anything else, and the reference blocks that are synced to the original synced block.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Original Synced Block&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br/&gt;
