To create a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt;, the developer needs to create an original synced block. Developers will be able to identify the original &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; because it does not &amp;quot;sync_from&amp;quot; any other block (i.e. the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_from&lt;/code&gt; property is set to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;null&lt;/code&gt;).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;This is an example of an &amp;quot;original&amp;quot; &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt;. Note that all of the blocks available to be synced in another &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; are captured in the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;children&lt;/code&gt; property.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;synced_block (original)&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;synced_block (original)&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;synced_from&amp;quot;: null,
        &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
            {
                &amp;quot;callout&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                        {
                            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                            &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                                &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Callout in synced block&amp;quot;
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Reference Synced Blocks&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;br/&gt;
To sync the content of the original &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; with another &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt;, the developer simply needs to refer to that &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; using the  &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_from&lt;/code&gt; property.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example of a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; referring to another &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt;. Note that only &amp;quot;original&amp;quot; synced blocks can be referenced in the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_from&lt;/code&gt; property.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;synced_block (reference to original) in request body&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;synced_block (reference to original) in request body&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;synced_from&amp;quot;: {
            &amp;quot;block_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;original_synced_block_id&amp;quot;
        }
    }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is the example response after creating the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_block&lt;/code&gt; above. We can tell that the content from the original synced block is synced with this one because this block has children even though we didn&amp;#x27;t explicitly set the children in the body of our API call above (i.e. &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;has_children&lt;/code&gt; property on the reference block is &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;true&lt;/code&gt;).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;synced_block (reference to original) in response body&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;synced_block (reference to original) in response body&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block_id&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-11-17T22:17:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-11-17T22:17:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;has_children&amp;quot;: true,
            &amp;quot;archived&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;synced_block&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;synced_from&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block_id&amp;quot;,
                    &amp;quot;block_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;original_synced_block_id&amp;quot;
                }
            }
        }
    ],
    &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: null,
    &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: false
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_warn&quot; theme=&quot;üöß&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üöß&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Important notes&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;ol&gt;
&lt;li&gt;The bot must have access to both the original and reference synced blocks&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Similar to the UI, we don&amp;#x27;t support changes to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;synced_from&lt;/code&gt; at this time&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ol&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;link_to_page-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-link-to-page-block-type&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_to_page&lt;/code&gt; block type&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to [object Object]&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#link_to_page-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding and retrieving &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_to_page&lt;/code&gt; block types. Using this block type, developers can now create page links to other pages (using the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;page_id&lt;/code&gt; property) and full page databases (using the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;database_id&lt;/code&gt; property).&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example request body for the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;append block children&lt;/a&gt; endpoint containing a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_to_page&lt;/code&gt; block type.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;link_to_page block type used in request body&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;link_to_page block type used in request body&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;link_to_page&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;link_to_page&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;,
                &amp;quot;page_id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;61cca5bd-c8c6-4fcc-b517-514da3b8b1e0&amp;quot;
            }
        }
    ]
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;template-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-template-block-type&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;template&lt;/code&gt; block type&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to [object Object]&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#template-block-type&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding and retrieving &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;template&lt;/code&gt; block types. Using this block type, developers can now create template that duplicates the its children blocks.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example request body for the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;append block children&lt;/a&gt; endpoint containing a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;template&lt;/code&gt; block type.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;template_block type used in request body&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;template_block type used in request body&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;template&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;template&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                    {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Create callout template&amp;quot;
                        }
                    }
                ],
                &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
                    {
                        &amp;quot;callout&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                                {
                                    &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                                    &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                                        &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Placeholder callout text&amp;quot;
                                    }
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    ]
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;november-10-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-november-10-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;November 10, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to November 10, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#november-10-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The public API now supports returning &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_preview&lt;/code&gt; blocks and mentions found in &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;! Previously these blocks had type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;unsupported&lt;/code&gt; and mentions were skipped in &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;. Note: &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;link_preview&lt;/code&gt;s cannot be created via the API, only returned in responses. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;See the documentation in &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/block#link-preview-blocks&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;blocks&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/rich-text#link-preview-mentions&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; for more information.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;link_preview&amp;quot;,
  //...other keys excluded
  &amp;quot;link_preview&amp;quot;: {
    &amp;quot;url&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;https://github.com/example/example-repo/pull/1234&amp;quot;
  }
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-25-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-25-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 25, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 25, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-25-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column_list&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;You can now add Column Lists and Columns to pages and other block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Column Lists are parent blocks for column children. They can only contain children of type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Columns are parent blocks for any supported block children, excluding &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column&lt;/code&gt;s. They can only be appended to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column_list&lt;/code&gt;s.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When initially creating a column list block via &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt;, the column list must have at least 2 columns, and those columns must have at least one child each. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;When fetching content for a column_list, first fetch the the column children via &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/get-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve block children&lt;/a&gt;. Then fetch the children for each column block.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example request body for appending &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column_list&lt;/code&gt; and nested &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;column&lt;/code&gt; children.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
    {
      &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column_list&amp;quot;,
      &amp;quot;column_list&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
          {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;column&amp;quot;: {
              &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
                {
                  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
                  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;,
                  &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                      {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                          &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some text here&amp;quot;
                        }
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;column&amp;quot;: {
              &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [
                {
                  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
                  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;,
                  &amp;quot;paragraph&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: [
                      {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                        &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                          &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some text here&amp;quot;
                        }
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;

&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-18-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-18-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 18, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 18, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-18-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;validation-on-embed-block-urls&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-validation-on-embed-block-ur-ls&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Validation on embed block URLs&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Validation on embed block URLs&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#validation-on-embed-block-urls&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;The public API will now return errors on embeds blocks that are not supported by the public API. The supported embed block types (as listed and kept up to date in the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/block#embed-blocks&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Block Object&lt;/a&gt; documentation): &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;ul&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Framer&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Twitter (tweets)&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Google Drive documents&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Gist&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Figma&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Invision,&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Loom&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Typeform&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Codepen&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;PDFs&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Google Maps&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Whimisical&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Miro&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Abstract&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Excalidraw&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Sketch&lt;/li&gt;
&lt;li&gt;Replit &lt;/li&gt;
&lt;/ul&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Previously failed embeds would return a successful request, but produce an error in the Notion Application. Failed embed requests will now return a 400 Client Error. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;For non embed URLs, consider using the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;bookmark&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;image&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-17-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-17-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 17, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 17, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-17-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Dates with times and timezones are now supported on Database Date Filters&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Dates with times and timezones are now supported on Database Date Filters&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Previously, the date filters &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;equals&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;after&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;before&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;on_or_after&lt;/code&gt;, and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;on_or_before&lt;/code&gt; only supported dates without times nor timezones. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;or&amp;quot;: [
            {
                &amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;My Time Property&amp;quot;,
                &amp;quot;date&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;before&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-20&amp;quot;
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    &amp;quot;sorts&amp;quot;: []
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Now the database date filters can accept ISO 8601 dates with timestamps and timezones.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {
        &amp;quot;or&amp;quot;: [
            {
                &amp;quot;property&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;My Time Property&amp;quot;,
                &amp;quot;date&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;before&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-15T12:00:00-07:00&amp;quot;
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    &amp;quot;sorts&amp;quot;: []
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;How Dates with times are compared&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;Date time comparisons are done with millisecond precision. If no timezone is provided, the default is UTC.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Equals Date filter&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;If a date without a time is provided to the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;equals&lt;/code&gt;, the comparison is done against the start and end of the UTC date provided (inclusive). If a date with a time is provided, the comparison is done with millisecond precision. If no timezone is provided, the default timezone is UTC.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-15-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-15-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 15, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 15, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-15-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Breadcrumb block types are now supported in the API&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Breadcrumb block types are now supported in the API&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding and retrieving &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;Breadcrumb&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;

&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block-id&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;has_children&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;archived&amp;quot;: false,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;breadcrumb&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;breadcrumb&amp;quot;: {}
        }
    ],
    &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: null,
    &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: false

&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-14-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-14-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 14, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 14, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-14-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Table of contents and divider block types are now supported&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Table of contents and divider block types are now supported&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for adding and retrieving &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;Table of Contents&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;Divider&lt;/code&gt; block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;table-of-contents-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-table-of-contents-blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Table of Contents blocks&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Table of Contents blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#table-of-contents-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;You can now can add Table of Contents blocks to pages and other blocks. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example response from &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; containing a Table of Contents block uploaded to Notion.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,

&lt;p&gt;We have added support for retrieving, adding and updating Equation Blocks. We have also added support for updating Embed, Bookmark and Media (including image, video, audio, file, pdf) block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;equation-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-equation-blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Equation Blocks&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Equation Blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#equation-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;You can now can add, retrieve, and update equation blocks when using the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; , &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/get-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve block children&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/update-a-block&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Update block&lt;/a&gt; API endpoints.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Below is an example response from &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; containing an equation block uploaded to Notion.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;block&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2d97bf53-7e79-4efd-a6b2-53c0026ed1b5&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-10-11T17:56:00.000Z&amp;quot;,

}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Media Blocks (video, audio, image, file, pdf)&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Media Blocks (video, audio, image, file, pdf)&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;
&lt;p&gt;You can now can update media blocks when using &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/update-a-block&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Update block&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_info&quot; theme=&quot;üìò&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;Only media blocks of type external are supported&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;Updated Media blocks must be of type &amp;quot;external&amp;quot; and must reference an external URL. &lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-7-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-7-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 7, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 7, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-7-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Users can now add and update Callout and Quote block types&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Users can now add and update Callout and Quote block types&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;blockquote class=&quot;callout callout_warn&quot; theme=&quot;üöß&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=&quot;callout-heading&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=&quot;callout-icon&quot;&gt;üöß&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;New API endpoints and block types not supported in older versions of the API as of September 28&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;As of September 28, 2021, new block types and API endpoints will &lt;em&gt;not&lt;/em&gt; be supported in older versions of the API. If you&amp;#x27;re currently on version &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2021-05-11&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2021-05-13&lt;/code&gt;, upgrade to &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;2021-08-16&lt;/code&gt; to take advantage of the new block types in this changelog and any other block types or endpoints introduced after September 28.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;API functionality introduced before September 28 will continue to work with older API versions.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;
&lt;p&gt;We have added support for retrieving, adding and updating quote and callout block types.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;quote-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-quote-blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Quote blocks&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Quote blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#quote-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Below is an example response from &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/patch-block-children&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; containing a quote block uploaded to Notion.&lt;/p&gt;

                    {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,

                            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.&amp;quot;,
                            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
                        },
                        &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
                            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
                            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: true,

                        &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
                    },
                    {
                        &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,

&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;h4 class=&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;callout-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-callout-blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Callout blocks&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Callout blocks&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#callout-blocks&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;

&lt;p&gt;Below is an example response from &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-block&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve block&lt;/a&gt; containing a callout block uploaded to Notion.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{

&lt;h2 class=&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;october-5-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-october-5-2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;October 5, 2021&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to October 5, 2021&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#october-5-2021&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;
&lt;h3 class=&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll&quot; align=&quot;&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint&quot; id=&quot;retrieve-page-property-item&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;heading-text&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;section-retrieve-page-property-item&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Retrieve page property item&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=&quot;Skip link to Retrieve page property item&quot; class=&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor&quot; href=&quot;#retrieve-page-property-item&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Developers can now individually retrieve the value of their page properties with the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page-property&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve a page property&lt;/a&gt; endpoint! This includes pagination through a list of property item objects for properties with long values or lots of page references such as formula, relations and rollups. See the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page-property&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;documentation&lt;/a&gt; for more info. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Use the &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-database&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Retrieve a database&lt;/a&gt; endpoint to obtain the &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;property_id&lt;/code&gt; .&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Simple Property Types&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Most properties will be identified by a &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;type&lt;/code&gt; with the property value in the object found in key &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{type}&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Example Request/Response&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;cURL&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;curl&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/some-property-id \
  --header &amp;#x27;Authorization: Bearer $NOTION_API_KEY&amp;#x27; \
  --header &amp;#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&amp;#x27;
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
  &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;number&amp;quot;,
  &amp;quot;number&amp;quot;: 2
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Paginated Property Types&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Properties of type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;title&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;relation&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;people&lt;/code&gt; will return a paginated list of &lt;a href=&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page-property#property-item-objects&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;Property Item Objects&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Example List Response&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;results&amp;quot;: [
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;rich_text&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,
                &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Avocado &amp;quot;,
                    &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null
                },
                &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {
                    &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,
                    &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,
                    &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,
                    &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,
                    &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,
                    &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;
                },
                &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Avocado &amp;quot;,
                &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null
            }
        },
... // additional results omitted. 
    ],
    &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some-next-cursor-value&amp;quot;,
    &amp;quot;has_more&amp;quot;: true
}
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Rollup Property Types&lt;/strong&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;Rollups of type &amp;#x27;Show Original&amp;#x27;, &amp;#x27;Show unique&amp;#x27;, &amp;#x27;Count unique&amp;#x27; and &amp;#x27;Median&amp;#x27; return a flattened list of property items. All other rollups are return a list of relations and (after pagination) a &lt;a href=&quot;&quot; target=&quot;&quot; title=&quot;&quot;&gt;rollup property value&lt;/a&gt; of type &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;date&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;number&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;&lt;em&gt;Example Paginated Property Item Request/Response&lt;/em&gt;&lt;/p&gt;
&lt;p&gt;A rollup page property with an aggregation that requires additional pagination. &lt;/p&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;cURL&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;curl&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/some-property-id?page_size=10&amp;amp;start_cursor=some-cursor-value \
  --header &amp;#x27;Authorization: Bearer $NOTION_API_KEY&amp;#x27; \
  --header &amp;#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&amp;#x27;
&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar&quot; role=&quot;tablist&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=&quot;true&quot; class=&quot;CodeTabs_active&quot; role=&quot;tab&quot; type=&quot;button&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=&quot;CodeTabs-inner&quot; role=&quot;tabpanel&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=&quot;Copy Code&quot; class=&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light&quot; data-lang=&quot;json&quot; name=&quot;&quot; tabindex=&quot;0&quot;&gt;{
    &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;list&amp;quot;,

        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;de5d73e8-3748-40fa-9102-f1290fe2444b&amp;quot;
            }
        },
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;164325b0-4c9e-416b-ba9c-037b4c9acdfd&amp;quot;
            }
        },
        {
            &amp;quot;object&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;property_item&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;,
            &amp;quot;relation&amp;quot;: {
                &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;456baa98-3239-4c1f-b0ea-bdae945aaf33&amp;quot;
            }
        }

    &amp;quot;next_cursor&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;some-next-cursor-value&amp;quot;,
