							&quot;content&quot;: &quot;another text&quot;,
							&quot;link&quot;: null
						},
						&quot;annotations&quot;: {
							&quot;bold&quot;: false,
							&quot;italic&quot;: false,
							&quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
							&quot;underline&quot;: false,
							&quot;code&quot;: false,
							&quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
						},
						&quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;another text&quot;,
						&quot;href&quot;: null
					}
				]
			}
		],
		&quot;function&quot;: &quot;show_original&quot;
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>This filter will no longer work in version 2022-02-22:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
	&quot;filter&quot;: {
		&quot;property&quot;: &quot;rollup property&quot;,
		&quot;rollup&quot;: {
			&quot;any&quot;: {
				&quot;text&quot;: {
					&quot;contains&quot;: &quot;update text&quot;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Instead, write:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
	&quot;filter&quot;: {
		&quot;property&quot;: &quot;rollup property&quot;,
		&quot;rollup&quot;: {
			&quot;any&quot;: {
				&quot;rich_text&quot;: {
					&quot;contains&quot;: &quot;update text&quot;
				}
			}
		}
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><em><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">formula</code> property filters accept <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">string</code> instead of <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">text</code></em></p>
<p>Rollup property filters must now be constructed with the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">string</code> keyword instead of the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">text</code> keyword if the value of the formula is a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">string</code>. Put concretely, if a page&#x27;s formula property is rendered like so:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">&quot;formula property&quot;: {
	&quot;id&quot;: &quot;m%5D%3F%5C&quot;,
	&quot;type&quot;: &quot;formula&quot;,
	&quot;formula&quot;: {
		&quot;type&quot;: &quot;string&quot;,
		&quot;string&quot;: &quot;update text 2,another text&quot;
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>This filter will no longer work in version 2022-02-22:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
	&quot;filter&quot;: {
		&quot;property&quot;: &quot;formula property&quot;,
		&quot;formula&quot;: {
			&quot;text&quot;: {
				&quot;contains&quot;: &quot;update text&quot;
			}
		}
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Instead, write this:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
	&quot;filter&quot;: {
		&quot;property&quot;: &quot;formula property&quot;,
		&quot;formula&quot;: {
			&quot;string&quot;: {
				&quot;contains&quot;: &quot;update text&quot;
			}
		}
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="property-list-items-now-have-types"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-property-list-items-now-have-types" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Property list items now have types</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Property list items now have types" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#property-list-items-now-have-types"></a></h3>
<p>Property item lists now always have type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">property_item</code>. Rollup aggregations are now returned inside that type. </p>
<p>We&#x27;ve also added the property <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">id</code> field and the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">next_url</code> to fetch the next set of property items.</p>
<p>Here is an example of a previous <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rollup</code> <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">property_item</code> list:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
  &quot;results&quot;: [
    {
      &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
      &quot;type&quot;: &quot;relation&quot;,
      &quot;relation&quot;: {
        &quot;id&quot;: &quot;83f92c9d-523d-466e-8c1f-9bc2c25a99fe&quot;
      }
    },
 		...
  ],
  &quot;next_cursor&quot;: &quot;some-next-cursor-value&quot;,
  &quot;has_more&quot;: true,
  &quot;rollup&quot;: {
    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot;,
    &quot;date&quot;: {
      &quot;start&quot;: &quot;2021-10-07T14:42:00.000+00:00&quot;,
      &quot;end&quot;: null
    },
    &quot;function&quot;: &quot;latest_date&quot;
  },
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rollup&quot;
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Here is an example of the updated <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rollup</code> <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">property_item</code> list:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
  &quot;results&quot;: [
    {
      &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
      &quot;id&quot;: &quot;xYz890&quot;,
      &quot;type&quot;: &quot;relation&quot;,
      &quot;relation&quot;: {
        &quot;id&quot;: &quot;83f92c9d-523d-466e-8c1f-9bc2c25a99fe&quot;
      }
    },
 		...
  ],
  &quot;next_cursor&quot;: &quot;some-next-cursor-value&quot;,
  &quot;has_more&quot;: true,
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
  &quot;property_item&quot;: {
    &quot;id&quot;: &quot;aBcD123&quot;
    &quot;next_url&quot;: &quot;https://api.notion.com/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/aBcD123?start_cursor=some-next-cursor-value&quot;,
    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rollup&quot;,
    &quot;rollup&quot;: {
    	&quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot;,
    	&quot;date&quot;: {
      	&quot;start&quot;: &quot;2021-10-07T14:42:00.000+00:00&quot;,
      	&quot;end&quot;: null
    	},
    	&quot;function&quot;: &quot;latest_date&quot;
		}
  },
  
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Deprecated the List Databases endpoint</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Deprecated the List Databases endpoint" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#deprecated-the-list-databases-endpoint"></a></h3>
<p>List all <a target="_self" href="/reference/database">Databases</a> endpoint is removed starting in this version. You can use the <a target="_self" href="/reference/post-search">Search API</a> for this functionality instead. The List Databases endpoint only returns explicitly shared databases, while search will also return child pages and databases within explicitly shared pages.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="january-31-2022---february-13-2022"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-january-31-2022-february-13-2022" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022</div><a aria-label="Skip link to January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#january-31-2022---february-13-2022"></a></h2>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>We&#x27;re trying something new</p></h2><p>We&#x27;re experimenting with publishing biweekly changelogs in addition to our existing changelogs about new features. The biweekly changelogs will include bug fixes and improvements that are not big enough to justify their own changelog entry.</p><p>The timing may be somewhat irregular until we smooth the process out, but we hope to align on a regular schedule soon. This is our first regular changelog entry; we hope you find it useful.</p></blockquote>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Bug fixes and performance improvements</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8"></a></h3>
<ul>
<li>We added an optimization for search when filtering by pages or databases. This should particularly help latency when using search to power a database picker in a large workspace. For more details about search and how to optimize search requests, see the <a target="_self" href="/reference/post-search">search documentation</a>.</li>
<li>We fixed an issue where fetching an embed block containing an uploaded file returned the wrong file URL.</li>
</ul>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="january-25-2022"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-january-25-2022" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>January 25, 2022</div><a aria-label="Skip link to January 25, 2022" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#january-25-2022"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Caption property is now supported for code block type</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Caption property is now supported for code block type" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#caption-property-is-now-supported-for-code-block-type"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for adding, updating, and retrieving the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">caption</code> property for <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">code</code> block types.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">append block children</a> containing a code block, with a caption, uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block-id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;code&quot;,
            &quot;code&quot;: {
                &quot;caption&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Hello Caption!&quot;,
                            &quot;link&quot;: null
                        },
                        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                            &quot;code&quot;: false,
                            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                        },
                        &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;Hello Caption!&quot;,
                        &quot;href&quot;: null
                    }
                ],
                &quot;text&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;const foo = \&quot;bar\&quot;&quot;,
                            &quot;link&quot;: null
                        },
                        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                            &quot;code&quot;: false,
                            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                        },
                        &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;const foo = \&quot;bar\&quot;&quot;,
                        &quot;href&quot;: null
                    }
                ],
                &quot;language&quot;: &quot;javascript&quot;
            }
        },
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="january-5-2022"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-january-5-2022" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>January 5, 2022</div><a aria-label="Skip link to January 5, 2022" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#january-5-2022"></a></h2>
<p>We have added support for simple tables in the API.</p>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Simple tables and simple table rows</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Simple tables and simple table rows" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#simple-tables-and-simple-table-rows"></a></h3>
<p>Tables are parent blocks for table row children. They can only contain children of type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table_row</code>.</p>
<p>When creating a table block via the <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> endpoint, the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table</code> must have at least 1 <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table_row</code> whose <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">cells</code> array has the same length as the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table_width</code>.</p>
<p>To fetch content for a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table</code>, fetch the the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table_row</code> children via <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>. The <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">table</code> block itself only contains formatting data, no content.</p>
<p>Table block example:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
	&quot;type&quot;: &quot;table&quot;,
	&quot;table&quot;: {
		&quot;table_width&quot;: 3,
		&quot;has_column_header&quot;: false,
		&quot;has_row_header&quot;: false
	}
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Table row block example:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;table_row&quot;,
  &quot;table_row&quot;: {
    &quot;cells&quot;: [
      [
        {
          &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
          &quot;text&quot;: {
            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;column 1 content&quot;,
            &quot;link&quot;: null
          },
          &quot;annotations&quot;: {
            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
            &quot;code&quot;: false,
            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
          },
          &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;column 1 content&quot;,
          &quot;href&quot;: null
        }
      ],
      [
        {
          &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
          &quot;text&quot;: {
            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;column 2 content&quot;,
            &quot;link&quot;: null
          },
          &quot;annotations&quot;: {
            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
            &quot;code&quot;: false,
            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
          },
          &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;column 2 content&quot;,
          &quot;href&quot;: null
        }
      ],
      [
        {
          &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
          &quot;text&quot;: {
            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;column 3 content&quot;,
            &quot;link&quot;: null
          },
          &quot;annotations&quot;: {
            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
            &quot;code&quot;: false,
            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
          },
          &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;column 3 content&quot;,
          &quot;href&quot;: null
        }
      ]
    ]
  }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>For more details, refer to the <a target="_self" href="/reference/block">Block object</a> docs.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="december-15-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-december-15-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>December 15, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to December 15, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#december-15-2021"></a></h2>
<p>Both public and internal integrations now support having more granular capabilities, which enforce what an integration can do and see in a Notion workspace. These capabilities when put together enforce which API endpoints an integration can call, and what content and user related information they are able to see. For further information on capabilities and best practices, see the <a target="_self" href="/reference/capabilities">capabilities reference</a>.</p>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="content-capabilities"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-content-capabilities" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Content capabilities</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Content capabilities" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#content-capabilities"></a></h3>
<p>Integrations can have any combination of read content, insert content, or update content capabilities.</p>
<ul>
<li>The <strong>read content</strong> capability gives the integration access to read existing content in a Notion workspace.</li>
<li>The <strong>insert content</strong> capability gives the integration permission to create new content in a Notion workspace.</li>
<li>The <strong>update content</strong> capability gives the integration permission to update existing content in a Notion workspace.</li>
</ul>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="user-capabilities"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-user-capabilities" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>User capabilities</div><a aria-label="Skip link to User capabilities" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#user-capabilities"></a></h3>
<p>Integrations have different levels of user capabilities, which affect how <a target="_self" href="/reference/user">user objects</a> are returned from the Notion API:</p>
<ul>
<li>No user information - the integration will not be able to request any information about users. User objects will not include information about the user, including name, profile images, or their email address.</li>
<li>User information without email addresses - user objects will include other information about the user, including their name or profile images, but omit the email address.</li>
<li>User information with email addresses - user objects will include all information about the user, including name, profile images, and their email address.</li>
</ul>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="limitations"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-limitations" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Limitations</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Limitations" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#limitations"></a></h3>
<p>An installed integration can never capabilities will never supersede the capabilities of the user who owns the integration. For example, an integration cannot insert or update on a page if the owner has read-only access.</p>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="existing-integrations"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-existing-integrations" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Existing integrations</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Existing integrations" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#existing-integrations"></a></h3>
<p>All existing integrations will continue to have the same functionality as before. Any integrations created before December 15, 2021 automatically will have all content capabilities, and user capabilities that give access to user information including email addresses.</p>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="updating-integrations"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-updating-integrations" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Updating integrations</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Updating integrations" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#updating-integrations"></a></h3>
<p>Update the capabilities on an existing integration through <a target="_self" href="https://www.notion.so/my-integrations">https://www.notion.so/my-integrations</a>. After updating a public integration&#x27;s capabilities, users will need to re-authenticate with the integration to apply the new capabilities to their installation. After re-authenticating a public integration with changed capabilities, or updating an internal integration with changed capabilities, the new capabilities will apply to all pages already shared with the integration. For more information on setting capabilities see the <a target="_self" href="/docs/authorization">Authorization</a> guide.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="december-14-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-december-14-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>December 14, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to December 14, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#december-14-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="time-zone-support"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-time-zone-support" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Time zone support</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Time zone support" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#time-zone-support"></a></h3>
<p>We have added an optional <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">time_zone</code> field (based on the <a target="_self" href="https://www.iana.org/time-zones">IANA database</a> time zone values) to the Date objects. Developers can now explicitly set the time zones of Date property values using the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">time_zone</code> field. Once this property is set explicitly, users will be able to see the same time zone in the app. When time zone information is provided in this method, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">start</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">end</code> cannot contain <a target="_self" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTC_offset">UTC offset</a>s. In addition when time zone information is provided in dates, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">start</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">end</code> cannot be dates without time information (i.e. <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">&quot;2020-12-08&quot;</code>).</p>
<p>The public API will always return the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">time_zone</code> field as <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">null</code> when rendering dates and time zone will be displayed as a <a target="_self" href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UTC_offset">UTC offset</a> in the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">start</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">end</code> date fields.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="november-17-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-november-17-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>November 17, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to November 17, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#november-17-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Synced Block, Link to Page and Template block types are now supported in the API</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Synced Block, Link to Page and Template block types are now supported in the API" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#synced-block-link-to-page-and-template-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for adding and retrieving <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_to_page</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">template</code> block types.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="synced_block-block-type"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-synced-block-block-type" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> block type</div><a aria-label="Skip link to [object Object]" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#synced_block-block-type"></a></h4>
<p>Similar to the UI, there are two versions of a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> -- the original block that was created first and doesn&#x27;t yet sync with anything else, and the reference blocks that are synced to the original synced block.</p>
<p><strong>Original Synced Block</strong><br/>
To create a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code>, the developer needs to create an original synced block. Developers will be able to identify the original <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> because it does not &quot;sync_from&quot; any other block (i.e. the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_from</code> property is set to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">null</code>).</p>
<p>This is an example of an &quot;original&quot; <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code>. Note that all of the blocks available to be synced in another <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> are captured in the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">children</code> property.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">synced_block (original)</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="synced_block (original)" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;synced_block&quot;,
    &quot;synced_block&quot;: {
        &quot;synced_from&quot;: null,
        &quot;children&quot;: [
            {
                &quot;callout&quot;: {
                    &quot;text&quot;: [
                        {
                            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                            &quot;text&quot;: {
                                &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Callout in synced block&quot;
                            }
                        }
                    ]
                }
            }
        ]
    }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><strong>Reference Synced Blocks</strong><br/>
To sync the content of the original <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> with another <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code>, the developer simply needs to refer to that <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> using the  <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_from</code> property.</p>
<p>Below is an example of a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> referring to another <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code>. Note that only &quot;original&quot; synced blocks can be referenced in the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_from</code> property.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">synced_block (reference to original) in request body</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="synced_block (reference to original) in request body" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;synced_block&quot;,
    &quot;synced_block&quot;: {
        &quot;synced_from&quot;: {
            &quot;block_id&quot;: &quot;original_synced_block_id&quot;
        }
    }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Below is the example response after creating the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_block</code> above. We can tell that the content from the original synced block is synced with this one because this block has children even though we didn&#x27;t explicitly set the children in the body of our API call above (i.e. <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">has_children</code> property on the reference block is <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">true</code>).</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">synced_block (reference to original) in response body</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="synced_block (reference to original) in response body" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block_id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-11-17T22:17:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-11-17T22:17:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: true,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;synced_block&quot;,
            &quot;synced_block&quot;: {
                &quot;synced_from&quot;: {
                    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;block_id&quot;,
                    &quot;block_id&quot;: &quot;original_synced_block_id&quot;
                }
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<blockquote class="callout callout_warn" theme="üöß"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üöß</span><p>Important notes</p></h2><ol>
<li>The bot must have access to both the original and reference synced blocks</li>
<li>Similar to the UI, we don&#x27;t support changes to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">synced_from</code> at this time</li>
</ol></blockquote>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="link_to_page-block-type"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-link-to-page-block-type" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_to_page</code> block type</div><a aria-label="Skip link to [object Object]" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#link_to_page-block-type"></a></h4>
<p>We have added support for adding and retrieving <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_to_page</code> block types. Using this block type, developers can now create page links to other pages (using the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">page_id</code> property) and full page databases (using the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">database_id</code> property).</p>
<p>Below is an example request body for the <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">append block children</a> endpoint containing a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_to_page</code> block type.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">link_to_page block type used in request body</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="link_to_page block type used in request body" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;children&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;link_to_page&quot;,
            &quot;link_to_page&quot;: {
                &quot;type&quot;: &quot;page_id&quot;,
                &quot;page_id&quot;: &quot;61cca5bd-c8c6-4fcc-b517-514da3b8b1e0&quot;
            }
        }
    ]
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="template-block-type"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-template-block-type" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">template</code> block type</div><a aria-label="Skip link to [object Object]" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#template-block-type"></a></h4>
<p>We have added support for adding and retrieving <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">template</code> block types. Using this block type, developers can now create template that duplicates the its children blocks.</p>
<p>Below is an example request body for the <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">append block children</a> endpoint containing a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">template</code> block type.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">template_block type used in request body</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="template_block type used in request body" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;children&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;template&quot;,
            &quot;template&quot;: {
                &quot;text&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Create callout template&quot;
                        }
                    }
                ],
                &quot;children&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;callout&quot;: {
                            &quot;text&quot;: [
                                {
                                    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                                    &quot;text&quot;: {
                                        &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Placeholder callout text&quot;
                                    }
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    ]
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="november-10-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-november-10-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>November 10, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to November 10, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#november-10-2021"></a></h2>
<p>The public API now supports returning <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_preview</code> blocks and mentions found in <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rich_text</code>! Previously these blocks had type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">unsupported</code> and mentions were skipped in <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rich_text</code>. Note: <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">link_preview</code>s cannot be created via the API, only returned in responses. </p>
<p>See the documentation in <a target="_self" href="/reference/block#link-preview-blocks">blocks</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/rich-text#link-preview-mentions"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rich_text</code></a> for more information.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;link_preview&quot;,
  //...other keys excluded
  &quot;link_preview&quot;: {
    &quot;url&quot;: &quot;https://github.com/example/example-repo/pull/1234&quot;
  }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-25-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-25-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 25, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 25, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-25-2021"></a></h2>
<p>We have added support for <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column_list</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code> block types.</p>
<p>You can now add Column Lists and Columns to pages and other block types.</p>
<p>Column Lists are parent blocks for column children. They can only contain children of type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code>.</p>
<p>Columns are parent blocks for any supported block children, excluding <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code>s. They can only be appended to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column_list</code>s.</p>
<p>When initially creating a column list block via <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a>, the column list must have at least 2 columns, and those columns must have at least one child each. </p>
<p>When fetching content for a column_list, first fetch the the column children via <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>. Then fetch the children for each column block.</p>
<p>Below is an example request body for appending <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column_list</code> and nested <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code> children.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;children&quot;: [
    {
      &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
      &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column_list&quot;,
      &quot;column_list&quot;: {
        &quot;children&quot;: [
          {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column&quot;,
            &quot;column&quot;: {
              &quot;children&quot;: [
                {
                  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
                  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;paragraph&quot;,
                  &quot;paragraph&quot;: {
                    &quot;text&quot;: [
                      {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                          &quot;content&quot;: &quot;some text here&quot;
                        }
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          },
          {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column&quot;,
            &quot;column&quot;: {
              &quot;children&quot;: [
                {
                  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
                  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;paragraph&quot;,
                  &quot;paragraph&quot;: {
                    &quot;text&quot;: [
                      {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                          &quot;content&quot;: &quot;some text here&quot;
                        }
                      }
                    ]
                  }
                }
              ]
            }
          }
        ]
      }
    }
  ]
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Below is an example response of appending <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column_list</code> children.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;ca042aa7-2e23-4541-8059-abff360d6752&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-25T17:00:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-25T17:00:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: true,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column_list&quot;,
            &quot;column_list&quot;: {}
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Below is an example request body for appending <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code> children. Note that the parent that is being added to must be a block of type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column_list</code>.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;children&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column&quot;,
            &quot;column&quot;: {
                &quot;children&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;paragraph&quot;,
                        &quot;paragraph&quot;: {
                            &quot;text&quot;: [
                                {
                                    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                                    &quot;text&quot;: {
                                        &quot;content&quot;: &quot;some text here&quot;
                                    }
                                }
                            ]
                        }
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    ]
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Below is an example response of appending <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">column</code> children.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;f40c3a13-30d1-4594-bd6f-cdbc15b2c006&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-25T21:25:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-25T21:25:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: true,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;column&quot;,
            &quot;column&quot;: {}
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-18-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-18-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 18, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 18, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-18-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="validation-on-embed-block-urls"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-validation-on-embed-block-ur-ls" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Validation on embed block URLs</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Validation on embed block URLs" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#validation-on-embed-block-urls"></a></h3>
<p>The public API will now return errors on embeds blocks that are not supported by the public API. The supported embed block types (as listed and kept up to date in the <a target="_self" href="/reference/block#embed-blocks">Block Object</a> documentation): </p>
<ul>
<li>Framer</li>
<li>Twitter (tweets)</li>
<li>Google Drive documents</li>
<li>Gist</li>
<li>Figma</li>
<li>Invision,</li>
<li>Loom</li>
<li>Typeform</li>
<li>Codepen</li>
<li>PDFs</li>
<li>Google Maps</li>
<li>Whimisical</li>
<li>Miro</li>
<li>Abstract</li>
<li>Excalidraw</li>
<li>Sketch</li>
<li>Replit </li>
</ul>
<p>Previously failed embeds would return a successful request, but produce an error in the Notion Application. Failed embed requests will now return a 400 Client Error. </p>
<p>For non embed URLs, consider using the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">bookmark</code> or <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">image</code> block types.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-17-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-17-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 17, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 17, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-17-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Dates with times and timezones are now supported on Database Date Filters</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Dates with times and timezones are now supported on Database Date Filters" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#dates-with-times-and-timezones-are-now-supported-on-database-date-filters"></a></h3>
<p>Previously, the date filters <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">equals</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">after</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">before</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">on_or_after</code>, and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">on_or_before</code> only supported dates without times nor timezones. </p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;filter&quot;: {
        &quot;or&quot;: [
            {
                &quot;property&quot;: &quot;My Time Property&quot;,
                &quot;date&quot;: {
                    &quot;before&quot;: &quot;2021-10-20&quot;
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    &quot;sorts&quot;: []
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>Now the database date filters can accept ISO 8601 dates with timestamps and timezones.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;filter&quot;: {
        &quot;or&quot;: [
            {
                &quot;property&quot;: &quot;My Time Property&quot;,
                &quot;date&quot;: {
                    &quot;before&quot;: &quot;2021-10-15T12:00:00-07:00&quot;
                }
            }
        ]
    },
    &quot;sorts&quot;: []
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>How Dates with times are compared</p></h2><p>Date time comparisons are done with millisecond precision. If no timezone is provided, the default is UTC.</p></blockquote>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>Equals Date filter</p></h2><p>If a date without a time is provided to the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">equals</code>, the comparison is done against the start and end of the UTC date provided (inclusive). If a date with a time is provided, the comparison is done with millisecond precision. If no timezone is provided, the default timezone is UTC.</p></blockquote>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-15-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-15-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 15, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 15, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-15-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Breadcrumb block types are now supported in the API</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Breadcrumb block types are now supported in the API" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#breadcrumb-block-types-are-now-supported-in-the-api"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for adding and retrieving <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">Breadcrumb</code> block types.</p>
<p>You can now can add Breadcrumb blocks to pages and other blocks. </p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> containing a Breadcrumb block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block-id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;breadcrumb&quot;,
            &quot;breadcrumb&quot;: {}
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-14-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-14-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 14, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 14, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-14-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Table of contents and divider block types are now supported</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Table of contents and divider block types are now supported" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#table-of-contents-and-divider-block-types-are-now-supported"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for adding and retrieving <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">Table of Contents</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">Divider</code> block types.</p>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="table-of-contents-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-table-of-contents-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Table of Contents blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Table of Contents blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#table-of-contents-blocks"></a></h3>
<p>You can now can add Table of Contents blocks to pages and other blocks. </p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> containing a Table of Contents block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block-id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,

            &quot;archived&quot;: false,

            &quot;table_of_contents&quot;: {}
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="divider-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-divider-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Divider blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Divider blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#divider-blocks"></a></h3>
<p>You can now can add Divider blocks to pages and other blocks. </p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> containing a Divider block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block-id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-14T18:10:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,

<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-11-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-11-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 11, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 11, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-11-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="users-can-now-add-equation-blocks-embed-bookmark-and-media-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-users-can-now-add-equation-blocks-embed-bookmark-and-media-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Users can now add Equation Blocks, Embed, Bookmark, and Media Blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Users can now add Equation Blocks, Embed, Bookmark, and Media Blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#users-can-now-add-equation-blocks-embed-bookmark-and-media-blocks"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for retrieving, adding and updating Equation Blocks. We have also added support for updating Embed, Bookmark and Media (including image, video, audio, file, pdf) block types.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="equation-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-equation-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Equation Blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Equation Blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#equation-blocks"></a></h4>
<p>You can now can add, retrieve, and update equation blocks when using the <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> , <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-block">Update block</a> API endpoints.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> containing an equation block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;2d97bf53-7e79-4efd-a6b2-53c0026ed1b5&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-11T17:56:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-11T17:56:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;equation&quot;,
            &quot;equation&quot;: {
                &quot;expression&quot;: &quot;e = mc^2&quot;
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Media Blocks (video, audio, image, file, pdf)</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Media Blocks (video, audio, image, file, pdf)" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#media-blocks-video-audio-image-file-pdf"></a></h4>
<p>You can now can update media blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-block">Update block</a>.</p>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>Only media blocks of type external are supported</p></h2><p>Updated Media blocks must be of type &quot;external&quot; and must reference an external URL. File upload is not currently supported.</p></blockquote>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-block">Update block</a> containing a video block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{

<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="embed-and-bookmark-block-types"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-embed-and-bookmark-block-types" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Embed and Bookmark Block Types</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Embed and Bookmark Block Types" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#embed-and-bookmark-block-types"></a></h4>
