<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-7-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-7-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 7, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 7, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-7-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Users can now add and update Callout and Quote block types</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Users can now add and update Callout and Quote block types" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#users-can-now-add-and-update-callout-and-quote-block-types"></a></h3>
<blockquote class="callout callout_warn" theme="üöß"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üöß</span><p>New API endpoints and block types not supported in older versions of the API as of September 28</p></h2><p>As of September 28, 2021, new block types and API endpoints will <em>not</em> be supported in older versions of the API. If you&#x27;re currently on version <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-05-11</code> or <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-05-13</code>, upgrade to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code> to take advantage of the new block types in this changelog and any other block types or endpoints introduced after September 28.</p><p>API functionality introduced before September 28 will continue to work with older API versions.</p></blockquote>
<p>We have added support for retrieving, adding and updating quote and callout block types.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="quote-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-quote-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Quote blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Quote blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#quote-blocks"></a></h4>
<p>You can now can add and retrieve quote blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> containing a quote block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;block-id&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-07T19:21:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-10-07T19:21:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;quote&quot;,
            &quot;quote&quot;: {
                &quot;text&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.&quot;,
                            &quot;link&quot;: null
                        },
                        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                            &quot;italic&quot;: true,
                            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                            &quot;code&quot;: false,
                            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                        },
                        &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;The digital revolution is far more significant than the invention of writing or even of printing.&quot;,
                        &quot;href&quot;: null
                    },
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;\n-Douglas Engelbart&quot;,
                            &quot;link&quot;: null
                        },
                        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                            &quot;underline&quot;: false,

                        },

<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="callout-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-callout-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Callout blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Callout blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#callout-blocks"></a></h4>
<p>You can now can add and retrieve callout blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-block">Retrieve block</a> containing a callout block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,

            }

<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-5-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-5-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 5, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 5, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-5-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="retrieve-page-property-item"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-retrieve-page-property-item" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Retrieve page property item</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Retrieve page property item" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#retrieve-page-property-item"></a></h3>
<p>Developers can now individually retrieve the value of their page properties with the <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-page-property">Retrieve a page property</a> endpoint! This includes pagination through a list of property item objects for properties with long values or lots of page references such as formula, relations and rollups. See the <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-page-property">documentation</a> for more info. </p>
<p>Use the <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-database">Retrieve a database</a> endpoint to obtain the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">property_id</code> .</p>
<p><strong>Simple Property Types</strong></p>
<p>Most properties will be identified by a <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type</code> with the property value in the object found in key <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">{type}</code>.</p>
<p><em>Example Request/Response</em></p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/some-property-id \
  --header &#x27;Authorization: Bearer $NOTION_API_KEY&#x27; \
  --header &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&#x27;
</code></pre></div></div>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;number&quot;,
  &quot;number&quot;: 2
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><strong>Paginated Property Types</strong></p>
<p>Properties of type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">title</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rich_text</code>, <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">relation</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">people</code> will return a paginated list of <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-page-property#property-item-objects">Property Item Objects</a></p>
<p><em>Example List Response</em></p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rich_text&quot;,
            &quot;rich_text&quot;: {
                &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                &quot;text&quot;: {
                    &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Avocado &quot;,
                    &quot;link&quot;: null
                },
                &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                    &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                    &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                    &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                    &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                    &quot;code&quot;: false,
                    &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                },
                &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;Avocado &quot;,
                &quot;href&quot;: null
            }
        },
... // additional results omitted. 
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: &quot;some-next-cursor-value&quot;,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: true
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><strong>Rollup Property Types</strong></p>
<p>Rollups of type &#x27;Show Original&#x27;, &#x27;Show unique&#x27;, &#x27;Count unique&#x27; and &#x27;Median&#x27; return a flattened list of property items. All other rollups are return a list of relations and (after pagination) a <a target="_self" href="">rollup property value</a> of type <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">date</code> or <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">number</code>.</p>
<p><em>Example Paginated Property Item Request/Response</em></p>
<p>A rollup page property with an aggregation that requires additional pagination. </p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/v1/pages/b55c9c91-384d-452b-81db-d1ef79372b75/properties/some-property-id?page_size=10&amp;start_cursor=some-cursor-value \
  --header &#x27;Authorization: Bearer $NOTION_API_KEY&#x27; \
  --header &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&#x27;
</code></pre></div></div>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;relation&quot;,
            &quot;relation&quot;: {
                &quot;id&quot;: &quot;de5d73e8-3748-40fa-9102-f1290fe2444b&quot;
            }
        },
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;relation&quot;,
            &quot;relation&quot;: {
                &quot;id&quot;: &quot;164325b0-4c9e-416b-ba9c-037b4c9acdfd&quot;
            }
        },
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;property_item&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;relation&quot;,
            &quot;relation&quot;: {
                &quot;id&quot;: &quot;456baa98-3239-4c1f-b0ea-bdae945aaf33&quot;
            }
        }
      ...
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: &quot;some-next-cursor-value&quot;,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: true,
    &quot;rollup&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;date&quot;,
        &quot;date&quot;: {
            &quot;start&quot;: &quot;2021-10-07T14:42:00.000+00:00&quot;,
            &quot;end&quot;: null
        },
        &quot;function&quot;: &quot;latest_date&quot;
    },
    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rollup&quot;
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-4-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-4-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 4, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 4, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-4-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="retrieve-your-tokens-bot-user-with-get-v1usersme"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-retrieve-your-tokens-bot-user-with-get-v-1-users-me" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Retrieve your token&#x27;s bot user with GET /v1/users/me</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Retrieve your token&#x27;s bot user with GET /v1/users/me" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#retrieve-your-tokens-bot-user-with-get-v1usersme"></a></h3>
<p>If you&#x27;re using Notion API version <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code>, you can now retrieve information about the bot associated with your API token, including its ID and the user who authorized it.</p>
<p><strong>Example request</strong></p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">curl --request GET \
  --url http://localhost:3000/v1/users/me \
  --header &#x27;Authorization: Bearer $NOTION_API_KEY&#x27; \
  --header &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&#x27;
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><strong>Example response</strong></p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;object&quot;: &quot;user&quot;,
  &quot;id&quot;: &quot;16d84278-ab0e-484c-9bdd-b35da3bd8905&quot;,
  &quot;name&quot;: &quot;pied piper&quot;,
  &quot;avatar_url&quot;: null,
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;bot&quot;,
  &quot;bot&quot;: {
    &quot;owner&quot;: {
      &quot;type&quot;: &quot;user&quot;,
      &quot;user&quot;: {
        &quot;object&quot;: &quot;user&quot;,
        &quot;id&quot;: &quot;5389a034-eb5c-47b5-8a9e-f79c99ef166c&quot;,
        &quot;name&quot;: &quot;christine makenotion&quot;,
        &quot;avatar_url&quot;: null,
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;person&quot;,
        &quot;person&quot;: {
          &quot;email&quot;: &quot;<a href="/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection" class="__cf_email__" data-cfemail="f2919a809b81869b9c97b29f9399979c9d869b9d9cdc919d9f">[email&#160;protected]</a>&quot;
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="october-1-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-october-1-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>October 1, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to October 1, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#october-1-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="new-functionality-not-available-to-old-api-versions-code-inline-databases-and-database-page-block"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-new-functionality-not-available-to-old-api-versions-code-inline-databases-and-database-page-block" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>New functionality not available to old API versions; code, inline databases, and database page block</div><a aria-label="Skip link to New functionality not available to old API versions; code, inline databases, and database page block" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#new-functionality-not-available-to-old-api-versions-code-inline-databases-and-database-page-block"></a></h3>
<blockquote class="callout callout_warn" theme="üöß"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üöß</span><p>New API endpoints and block types not supported in older versions of the API as of September 28</p></h2><p>As of September 28, 2021, new block types and API endpoints will <em>not</em> be supported in older versions of the API. If you&#x27;re currently on version <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-05-11</code> or <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-05-13</code>, upgrade to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code> to take advantage of the new block types in this changelog and any other block types or endpoints introduced after September 28.</p><p>API functionality introduced before September 28 will continue to work with older API versions.</p></blockquote>
<p>We have added support for retrieving, adding and updating code blocks, inline databases and database page blocks.</p>
<p><strong>Code blocks</strong> </p>
<p>You can now can retrieve and add code blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a> containing a code block uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;ee27cd42-eaad-467f-9956-c0aa4efa94b5&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-09-22T20:27:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-09-27T19:25:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;code&quot;,
            &quot;code&quot;: {
                &quot;text&quot;: [
                    {
                        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                        &quot;text&quot;: {
                            &quot;content&quot;: &quot;const a = 21\nconst b = a + 5&quot;,
                            &quot;link&quot;: null
                        },
                        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                            &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                            &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                            &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                            &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                            &quot;code&quot;: false,
                            &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                        },
                        &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;const a = 21\nconst b = a + 5&quot;,
                        &quot;href&quot;: null
                    }
                ],
                &quot;language&quot;: &quot;javascript&quot;
            }
        },
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p><strong>Inline databases and database page blocks</strong></p>
<p>You can now can retrieve child database blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-block">Retrieve block</a>.</p>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>Updating <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">child_database</code> blocks</p></h2><p>To update <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">child_database</code> type blocks, use the <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-database">Update database</a> endpoint. Updating the block&#x27;s <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">title</code> updates the text displayed in the associated <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">child_database</code> block.</p></blockquote>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a> containing a child database uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;0d6ff4f9-1211-4129-ab4a-19dfc33d4d7a&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-09-27T20:25:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-09-27T20:25:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;archived&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;child_database&quot;,
            &quot;child_database&quot;: {
                &quot;title&quot;: &quot;My child database&quot;
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="september-21-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-september-21-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>September 21, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to September 21, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#september-21-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="workspace-level-tokens-for-public-integrations-will-be-deprecated-soon-migrate-your-oauth-flows"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-workspace-level-tokens-for-public-integrations-will-be-deprecated-soon-migrate-your-o-auth-flows" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Workspace-level tokens for public integrations will be deprecated soon; migrate your OAuth flows</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Workspace-level tokens for public integrations will be deprecated soon; migrate your OAuth flows" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#workspace-level-tokens-for-public-integrations-will-be-deprecated-soon-migrate-your-oauth-flows"></a></h3>
<p>Starting today we will be changing who can authorize public integrations in Notion workspaces. The previously released authorization method will be fully deprecated on October 19.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="about-the-change"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-about-the-change" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>About the change</div><a aria-label="Skip link to About the change" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#about-the-change"></a></h4>
<p>Currently OAuth tokens function on a workspace level: only admins in a workspace can grant access and there can only be one token per workspace per integration. After a brief transition period (see &quot;How to prepare for this change&quot; below) we will be switching exclusively to user-level tokens. These can be granted by any admin or member in the workspace, and there can be as many tokens per workspace as there are admins and members in the workspace. </p>
<p>See the table for the differences between these two methods:</p>








































<div class="rdmd-table"><div class="rdmd-table-inner"><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align:left"></th><th style="text-align:left">Workspace-level tokens (old)</th><th style="text-align:left">User-level tokens (new)</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align:left">Who can go through OAuth and grant access</td><td style="text-align:left">Admins only</td><td style="text-align:left">Admins and members</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">Number of access tokens per workspace</td><td style="text-align:left">1</td><td style="text-align:left">Up to N, where N is the number of admins and members</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">Who can go through OAuth and reauthorize access for a given token</td><td style="text-align:left">Only the original user who went through OAuth to grant the token</td><td style="text-align:left">Only the original user who went through OAuth to grant the token</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">OAuth token response</td><td style="text-align:left">Contains an <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">owner</code> field with the value <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">{ workspace: true }</code></td><td style="text-align:left">Contains an <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">owner</code> field with the value <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">{ user: &lt;API user object&gt; }</code></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">What resources an integration has access to</td><td style="text-align:left">Pages/databases the installing user chooses via the page picker during OAuth; pages/databases the installing user and other users in the workspace share with the integration via the Page menu;  children of pages/databases that were shared with the integration</td><td style="text-align:left">Pages/databases the installing user chooses via the page picker during OAuth; pages/databases the installing user shares with the integration via the Page menu;  children of pages/databases that were shared with the integration</td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left">What an integration can do with resources it has access to</td><td style="text-align:left">Read and write</td><td style="text-align:left">Read and write</td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="how-to-prepare-for-this-change"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-how-to-prepare-for-this-change" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>How to prepare for this change:</div><a aria-label="Skip link to How to prepare for this change:" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#how-to-prepare-for-this-change"></a></h4>
<p>This change only affects public integrations; that is, integrations that can be installed across many workspaces via OAuth. It does not affect internal integrations.</p>
<ol>
<li>Ensure that you can store and handle multiple Notion API tokens per workspace where your integration is granted access. You may map tokens directly to the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">bot_id</code> which is returned in the OAuth token response and is guaranteed to be unique per API token. 
<ul>
<li>To avoid overwriting tokens, do not map the token to the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">workspace_id</code> returned in the OAuth token response, since a workspace may have multiple tokens. Do not map the token to the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">owner.user.id</code> in the OAuth token response, since a user may install your integration in multiple workspaces.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Add <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">&amp;owner=user</code> to your OAuth authorization URL (the url starting with <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">https://api.notion.com/v1/oauth/authorize</code>) once your application is ready for user-level tokens.</li>
</ol>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="what-to-expect-on-october-19"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-what-to-expect-on-october-19" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>What to expect on October 19</div><a aria-label="Skip link to What to expect on October 19" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#what-to-expect-on-october-19"></a></h4>
<p>On October 19, we will migrate all existing workspace-level tokens to user-level tokens. We will also default to creating user-level tokens when a user goes through OAuth, regardless of the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">owner</code> parameter in the OAuth URL.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="september-17-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-september-17-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>September 17, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to September 17, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#september-17-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="database-objects-now-contain-url"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-database-objects-now-contain-url" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Database objects now contain url</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Database objects now contain url" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#database-objects-now-contain-url"></a></h3>
<p><a target="_self" href="/reference/database">Database objects</a> now return the web address of the database in the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">url</code> key. </p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">{

<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="september-10-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-september-10-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>September 10, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to September 10, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#september-10-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="users-can-now-delete-block-objects"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-users-can-now-delete-block-objects" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Users can now delete Block objects</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Users can now delete Block objects" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#users-can-now-delete-block-objects"></a></h3>
<p>The Notion API now supports the <a target="_self" href="/reference/delete-a-block">Delete a block</a> endpoint for all supported block types (include pages). The endpoint mirrors the behavior in the Notion application UI where items are added to the &quot;Trash&quot; bucket. In addition, the <a target="_self" href="/reference/block">Block object</a> now returns a boolean <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">archived</code> field to denote if the block has been deleted.</p>
<p>After deleting (archiving) the block, it can be unarchived using the <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-block">Update a block</a> or <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-page">Update page</a> endpoint with the body <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">{ archived: false }</code>.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-request"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-request" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example Request</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example Request" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-request"></a></h4>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">curl &#x27;https://api.notion.com/v1/blocks/9bc30ad4-9373-46a5-84ab-0a7845ee52e6&#x27; \
  -H &#x27;Authorization: Bearer &#x27;&quot;$NOTION_API_KEY&quot;&#x27;&#x27; \
  -H &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&#x27;
  -X DELETE \
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-response"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-response" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example response</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example response" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-response"></a></h4>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{

  &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-03-16T16:32:00.000Z&quot;,
  &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
  &quot;type&quot;: &quot;to_do&quot;,
  &quot;archived&quot;: true
  &quot;to_do&quot;: {
    &quot;text&quot;: [
      {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
        &quot;text&quot;: {
          &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Lacinato kale&quot;,
          &quot;link&quot;: null
        },
        &quot;annotations&quot;: {
          &quot;bold&quot;: false,
          &quot;italic&quot;: false,
          &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
          &quot;underline&quot;: false,
          &quot;code&quot;: false,
          &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
        },
        &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;Lacinato kale&quot;,
        &quot;href&quot;: null
      }
    ],
    &quot;checked&quot;: false
  }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="september-9-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-september-9-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>September 9, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to September 9, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#september-9-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="relation-and-rollup-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-relation-and-rollup-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Relation and rollup properties can now be created in databases</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Relation and rollup properties can now be created in databases" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#relation-and-rollup-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases"></a></h3>
<p>When <a target="_self" href="/reference/create-a-database">creating</a> or <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-database">updating</a> databases, you can now add <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">relation</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">rollup</code> property types. Note that the related database must also be shared with the integration.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-request-1"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-request" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example request</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example request" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-request-1"></a></h4>

--header &#x27;Authorization: Bearer &#x27;&quot;$NOTION_API_KEY&quot;&#x27;&#x27; \
--header &#x27;Content-Type: application/json&#x27; \
--header &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-08-16&#x27; \
--data &#x27;{
    &quot;parent&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;page_id&quot;,
        &quot;page_id&quot;: &quot;98ad959b-2b6a-4774-80ee-00246fb0ea9b&quot;
    },
    &quot;title&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
            &quot;text&quot;: {
                &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Grocery List&quot;,
                &quot;link&quot;: null
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;properties&quot;: {
        &quot;Name&quot;: {
            &quot;title&quot;: {}
        },
        &quot;Description&quot;: {
            &quot;rich_text&quot;: {}
        },
        &quot;In stock&quot;: {

        },

          &quot;relation&quot;: {
            &quot;database_id&quot;: &quot;668d797c-76fa-4934-9b05-ad288df2d136&quot;,
          }
    		},
        &quot;Number of meals&quot;: {
          &quot;rollup&quot;: {
            &quot;rollup_property_name&quot;: &quot;Name&quot;,
            &quot;relation_property_name&quot;: &quot;Meals&quot;,
            &quot;function&quot;: &quot;count&quot;
          }
        }
    }
}&#x27;
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-response-1"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-response" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example response</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example response" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-response-1"></a></h4>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{

<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="august-24-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-august-24-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>August 24, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to August 24, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#august-24-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="page-icons-cover-images-new-block-types-and-improved-page-file-properties"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-page-icons-cover-images-new-block-types-and-improved-page-file-properties" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Page icons, cover images, new block types, and improved page file properties</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Page icons, cover images, new block types, and improved page file properties" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#page-icons-cover-images-new-block-types-and-improved-page-file-properties"></a></h3>
<p>We have added support for linking to external image and file URLs, and many new block types, including image, embed, and file blocks.</p>
<p>You can now use the Notion API to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Retrieve and update <a target="_self" href="/reference/page">page</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/database">database</a> icons and cover images.</li>
<li><a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">List</a>  and <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">append</a> embed, image, video, file, PDF, and bookmark blocks</li>
<li>Retrieve URL for <a target="_self" href="/reference/page#files-property-values">file page properties</a></li>
<li>Update <a target="_self" href="/reference/page#files-property-values">file page properties</a></li>
</ul>
<p>We do not yet support uploading files to Notion through the API, however, any files already uploaded to Notion can be retrieved. You can reference the details of what is supported <a target="_self" href="#externally-hosted-files-vs-files-hosted-by-notion">here</a>.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="page-icons-and-cover-images"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-page-icons-and-cover-images" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Page Icons and Cover Images</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Page Icons and Cover Images" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#page-icons-and-cover-images"></a></h4>
<p>When fetching a <a target="_self" href="/reference/page">Page object</a> or a <a target="_self" href="/reference/database">Database object</a>, the response will now include an <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">icon</code> and <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">cover</code> property, as shown below:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;database&quot;,
    &quot;id&quot;: &quot;96433ad8-3fbe-460f-a007-72311c4aa804&quot;,
    &quot;cover&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;external&quot;,
        &quot;external&quot;: {
            &quot;url&quot;: &quot;https://website.domain/images/image.png&quot;
        }
    },
    &quot;icon&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;emoji&quot;,
        &quot;emoji&quot;: &quot;üéâ&quot;
    },
    // ... remaining properties
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>The <a target="_self" href="/reference/post-page">Create a page</a>, <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-page">Update page</a>, <a target="_self" href="/reference/create-a-database">Create a database</a>, and <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-database">Update database</a> API endpoints now support the ability to set the page icon and cover image.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="new-block-types"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-new-block-types" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>New Block Types</div><a aria-label="Skip link to New Block Types" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#new-block-types"></a></h4>
<p>You can now can retrieve and add embed, image, video, file, pdf, and bookmark blocks when using <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append block children</a> and <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a>.</p>
<p>Below is an example response from <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-page">Retrieve a page</a> containing an image uploaded to Notion.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;list&quot;,
    &quot;results&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;object&quot;: &quot;block&quot;,
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;4896a9bf-ada2-4bec-8ea2-97bccf07c4ef&quot;,
            &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T21:12:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T21:12:00.000Z&quot;,
            &quot;has_children&quot;: false,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;image&quot;,
            &quot;image&quot;: {
                &quot;caption&quot;: [],
                &quot;type&quot;: &quot;file&quot;,
                &quot;file&quot;: {
                    &quot;url&quot;: &quot;https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/64f658a7-eb31-4f98-8bea-0aa2956ec475/brocolli.jpeg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&amp;X-Amz-Credential=AKIAEXAMPLE_REDACTED%2F20210820%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&amp;X-Amz-Date=20210820T211229Z&amp;X-Amz-Expires=3600&amp;X-Amz-Signature=e2adc496254ccc741d7ab4f3bab0de7a51b60e31a49d11fcf8702ead2ec9ec18&amp;X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&quot;,
                    &quot;expiry_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T22:12:29.066Z&quot;
                }
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;next_cursor&quot;: null,
    &quot;has_more&quot;: false
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>Third-party App Embeds</p></h2><p>Third-party web applications, e.g. Typeform, Figma, etc., are retrieved and added as embed blocks.</p></blockquote>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="file-page-properties"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-file-page-properties" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>File Page Properties</div><a aria-label="Skip link to File Page Properties" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#file-page-properties"></a></h4>
<p>When retrieving file page properties, you&#x27;ll now get a link to the file as well as the name.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;page&quot;,
    &quot;properties&quot;: {
        &quot;Files&quot;: {
            &quot;id&quot;: &quot;YP~`&quot;,
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;files&quot;,
            &quot;files&quot;: [
                {
                    &quot;name&quot;: &quot;Brocolli&quot;,
                    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;file&quot;,
                    &quot;file&quot;: {
                        &quot;url&quot;: &quot;https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/secure.notion-static.com/c32db351-d1ea-40c2-9660-820db28c44ad/brocolli.jpeg?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&amp;X-Amz-Credential=AKIAEXAMPLE_REDACTED%2F20210820%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&amp;X-Amz-Date=20210820T211042Z&amp;X-Amz-Expires=3600&amp;X-Amz-Signature=859a24c9b7153860b252fa5955829a97632650dcdc5e91c7a831a48c5efecae4&amp;X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&quot;,
                        &quot;expiry_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T22:10:42.022Z&quot;
                    }
                },
                {
                    &quot;name&quot;: &quot;Text File&quot;,
                    &quot;type&quot;: &quot;external&quot;,
                    &quot;external&quot;: {
                        &quot;url&quot;: &quot;https://website.domain/files/doc.txt&quot;
                    }
                }
            ]
        },
    },
    // ... remaining properties
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<p>We also support updating file page properties via <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-page">Update page</a>.</p>
<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="august-20-2021"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-august-20-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>August 20, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to August 20, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#august-20-2021"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="releasing-notion-version-2021-08-16"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-releasing-notion-version-2021-08-16" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Releasing Notion-Version 2021-08-16</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Releasing Notion-Version 2021-08-16" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#releasing-notion-version-2021-08-16"></a></h3>
<p>We&#x27;re releasing Notion-Version <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code> with the following <em>backwards incompatible</em> changes:</p>
<ul>
<li><a target="_self" href="#unknown-keys-will-fail-validation">Unknown Keys Will Fail Validation</a></li>
<li><a target="_self" href="#changes-to-array-rollup-property-types">Rollup Property Types</a></li>
<li><a target="_self" href="#append-block-children-returns-a-list-of-blocks">Append Block Children</a></li>
<li><a target="_self" href="#property-ids-are-now-url-safe">URL Safe Property IDs</a></li>
<li><a target="_self" href="#empty-database-properties-are-now-returned-as-null">Empty Properties Are Now Returned</a></li>
</ul>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="unknown-keys-will-fail-validation"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-unknown-keys-will-fail-validation" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Unknown Keys Will Fail Validation</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Unknown Keys Will Fail Validation" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#unknown-keys-will-fail-validation"></a></h4>
<p>Previously, our endpoints used to only validate against the expected keys in both request body parameters as well as query parameters resulting in some ambiguity between incorrect behavior and invalid inputs. Going forward, to improve the developer experience we will be raising validation errors if keys that are not supported by our API are passed in to requests.</p>
<blockquote class="callout callout_info" theme="üìò"><h2 class="callout-heading"><span class="callout-icon">üìò</span><p>Migration Tip</p></h2><p>To safely migrate to <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code>, we recommend thoroughly testing your API calls against the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code> version, to see if you get any validation errors due to this change. If you do, remove any parameters that are rejected due to unknown keys.</p></blockquote>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="changes-to-array-rollup-property-types"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-changes-to-array-rollup-property-types" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Changes to Array Rollup Property Types</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Changes to Array Rollup Property Types" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#changes-to-array-rollup-property-types"></a></h4>
<p>Starting with the Notion-Version header <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code>, we are introducing a change to the response for rollup properties on a page which are arrays. Number and date rollups are unaffected. Specifically, the <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type</code> of elements within an array rollup has been made consistent with property types across other API endpoints:</p>





















<div class="rdmd-table"><div class="rdmd-table-inner"><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align:left">Before</th><th style="text-align:left">After</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;file&quot;</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;files&quot;</code></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;text&quot;</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;rich_text&quot;</code></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;person&quot;</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">type: &quot;people&quot;</code></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
<p>An example rollup property value for an array of rich text values, using Notion-Version <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">2021-08-16</code>:</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
  &quot;properties&quot;: {
    &quot;sample text array rollup&quot;: {
      &quot;id&quot;: &quot;NXTh&quot;,
      &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rollup&quot;,
      &quot;rollup&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;array&quot;,
        &quot;array&quot;: [
          {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rich_text&quot;,
            &quot;rich_text&quot;: [
              {
                &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                &quot;text&quot;: {
                  &quot;content&quot;: &quot;hello world!&quot;,
                  &quot;link&quot;: null
                },
                &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                  &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                  &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                  &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                  &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                  &quot;code&quot;: false,
                  &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                },
                &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;hello world!&quot;,
                &quot;href&quot;: null
              }
            ]
          },
          {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;rich_text&quot;,
            &quot;rich_text&quot;: [
              {
                &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
                &quot;text&quot;: {
                  &quot;content&quot;: &quot;foo bar&quot;,
                  &quot;link&quot;: null
                },
                &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                  &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                  &quot;italic&quot;: false,
                  &quot;strikethrough&quot;: false,
                  &quot;underline&quot;: false,
                  &quot;code&quot;: false,
                  &quot;color&quot;: &quot;default&quot;
                },
                &quot;plain_text&quot;: &quot;foo bar&quot;,
                &quot;href&quot;: null
              }
            ]
          }
        ]
      }
    }, 
  }
}
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="append-block-children-returns-a-list-of-blocks"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-append-block-children-returns-a-list-of-blocks" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Append Block Children returns a list of blocks</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Append Block Children returns a list of blocks" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#append-block-children-returns-a-list-of-blocks"></a></h4>
<p>The <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-block-children">Append Block Children</a> endpoint will now return a list of the newly created <a target="_self" href="/reference/block">Block object</a> children. </p>
<p>Previously the endpoint returned the block object of the parent block. Developers can instead use the <a target="_self" href="/reference/retrieve-a-block">Retrieve a block</a> endpoint to get the full block object for a specified <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">block_id</code>. </p>
<p>This change allows developers to get <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">block_id</code>&#x27;s and additional information of the new blocks right after they&#x27;re created. Note: only the first level block children are returned. To get sub-children, use the <a target="_self" href="/reference/get-block-children">Retrieve block children</a> endpoint.</p>

<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="property-ids-are-now-url-safe"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-property-i-ds-are-now-url-safe" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Property IDs are now URL Safe</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Property IDs are now URL Safe" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#property-ids-are-now-url-safe"></a></h4>
<p>Endpoints that return property IDs as part of the response body will now return new URL safe encoded property IDs. Any request that uses property IDs (such as <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-database">Update a database</a> or <a target="_self" href="/reference/patch-page">Update a page</a>) should use the new URL safe ID. </p>
<p>This ensures all property IDs can be referenced in the URL of any new endpoints moving forward. </p>





















<div class="rdmd-table"><div class="rdmd-table-inner"><table><thead><tr><th style="text-align:left">Before</th><th style="text-align:left">After</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">DoS\</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">DoS%5C</code></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">title</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">title</code></td></tr><tr><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">vEKn</code></td><td style="text-align:left"><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">vEKn</code></td></tr></tbody></table></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="empty-database-properties-are-now-returned-as-null"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-empty-database-properties-are-now-returned-as-null" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Empty database properties are now returned as <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">null</code></div><a aria-label="Skip link to Empty database properties are now returned as " class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#empty-database-properties-are-now-returned-as-null"></a></h4>
<p>Previously, empty properties of date, email, number, and rollup types were omitted from the page response. Now, these empty properties are returned with <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">null</code> values.</p>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">Example page response with empty properties</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="Example page response with empty properties" tabindex="0">{

<h2 class="heading heading-2 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="august-20-2021-1"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-august-20-2021" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>August 20, 2021</div><a aria-label="Skip link to August 20, 2021" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#august-20-2021-1"></a></h2>
<h3 class="heading heading-3 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="formula-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-formula-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Formula properties can now be created in databases</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Formula properties can now be created in databases" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#formula-properties-can-now-be-created-in-databases"></a></h3>
<p>When <a target="_self" href="/reference/create-a-database">creating</a> or <a target="_self" href="/reference/update-a-database">updating</a> databases, you can now add <button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang- theme-light" data-lang="" name="" tabindex="0">formula</code> property types.</p>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-request-2"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-request" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example request</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example request" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-request-2"></a></h4>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">cURL</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light" data-lang="curl" name="" tabindex="0">curl --location --request POST &#x27;https://api.notion.com/v1/databases/&#x27; \
--header &#x27;Authorization: Bearer &#x27;&quot;$NOTION_API_KEY&quot;&#x27;&#x27; \
--header &#x27;Content-Type: application/json&#x27; \
--header &#x27;Notion-Version: 2021-05-13&#x27; \
--data &#x27;{
    &quot;parent&quot;: {
        &quot;type&quot;: &quot;page_id&quot;,
        &quot;page_id&quot;: &quot;98ad959b-2b6a-4774-80ee-00246fb0ea9b&quot;
    },
    &quot;title&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
            &quot;text&quot;: {
                &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Grocery List&quot;,
                &quot;link&quot;: null
            }
        }
    ],
    &quot;properties&quot;: {
        &quot;Name&quot;: {
            &quot;title&quot;: {}
        },
        &quot;Description&quot;: {
            &quot;rich_text&quot;: {}
        },
        &quot;In stock&quot;: {
            &quot;checkbox&quot;: {}
        },
        &quot;Price&quot;: {
            &quot;number&quot;: {
                &quot;format&quot;: &quot;dollar&quot;
            }
        },
        &quot;Cost of next trip&quot;: {
            &quot;formula&quot;: {
                &quot;expression&quot;: &quot;if(prop(\&quot;In stock\&quot;), 0, prop(\&quot;Price\&quot;))&quot;
            }
        }
    }
}&#x27;
</code></pre></div></div>
<h4 class="heading heading-4 header-scroll" align=""><div class="heading-anchor anchor waypoint" id="example-response-2"></div><div class="heading-text"><div id="section-example-response" class="heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility"></div>Example response</div><a aria-label="Skip link to Example response" class="heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor" href="#example-response-2"></a></h4>
<div class="CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light"><div class="CodeTabs-toolbar" role="tablist"><button aria-selected="true" class="CodeTabs_active" role="tab" type="button">JSON</button></div><div class="CodeTabs-inner" role="tabpanel"><pre><button aria-label="Copy Code" class="rdmd-code-copy fa"></button><code class="rdmd-code lang-json theme-light" data-lang="json" name="" tabindex="0">{
    &quot;object&quot;: &quot;database&quot;,
    &quot;id&quot;: &quot;c23f0085-a061-41c0-b8a6-cbe14d15a4de&quot;,
    &quot;created_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T16:08:00.000Z&quot;,
    &quot;last_edited_time&quot;: &quot;2021-08-20T16:08:00.000Z&quot;,
    &quot;title&quot;: [
        {
            &quot;type&quot;: &quot;text&quot;,
            &quot;text&quot;: {
                &quot;content&quot;: &quot;Grocery List&quot;,
                &quot;link&quot;: null
            },
            &quot;annotations&quot;: {
                &quot;bold&quot;: false,
                &quot;italic&quot;: false,
