id=\&quot;we-will-soon-be-rolling-out-changes-to-the-formulas-property-formulas-20-and-as-such-we-will-be-making-a-change-to-the-notion-public-api\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-we-will-soon-be-rolling-out-changes-to-the-formulas-property-formulas-2-0-and-as-such-we-will-be-making-a-change-to-the-notion-public-api\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;We will soon be rolling out changes to the Formulas property (Formulas 2.0), and as such, we will be making a change to the Notion Public API.&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to We will soon be rolling out changes to the Formulas property (Formulas 2.0), and as such, we will be making a change to the Notion Public API.\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#we-will-soon-be-rolling-out-changes-to-the-formulas-property-formulas-20-and-as-such-we-will-be-making-a-change-to-the-notion-public-api\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;This is a non-versioned change and is expected to be in effect in the next couple weeks.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;tl;dr:&lt;/strong&gt; As part of the Formulas 2.0 rollout, the Public API‚Äôs format of the string value for &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/property-object#formula\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;formula.expression&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; will be changing. Public API calls with formula inputs in the old format will still succeed. On write operations, the old format will be supported indefinitely, but on read, only the new format will be returned. This change is being made to improve the formulas experience and ensure parity with the Notion app. &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;No action is required for creating or updating database formulas. Reading database &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/property-object#formula\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;formula.expression&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; values may require developer changes.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h4 class=\&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;what-do-you-need-to-know\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-what-do-you-need-to-know\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;What do you need to know?&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to What do you need to know?\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#what-do-you-need-to-know\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;\n&lt;p&gt; &lt;strong&gt;The string value of &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;formula.expression&lt;/code&gt; is changing; the schema is not.&lt;/strong&gt; &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;&lt;strong&gt;On write&lt;/strong&gt; via the Public API (&lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/create-a-database\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;create&lt;/a&gt; or &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/update-a-database\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;update&lt;/a&gt; database endpoints), Notion will support using the old format as a Public API input in the formula property schema indefinitely &lt;em&gt;and&lt;/em&gt; will support writing in the &lt;strong&gt;new&lt;/strong&gt; format.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Database objects returned via the Public API will have the new formulas 2.0 format.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;JavaScript&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-javascript theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;javascript\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;// Old format\n&amp;quot;Updated price&amp;quot;: {\n  &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;YU%7C%40&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Updated price&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;: {\n    &amp;quot;expression&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;prop(\\&amp;quot;Price\\&amp;quot;) * 2&amp;quot;\n  }\n}\n\n// New format (upcoming)\n&amp;quot;Updated price&amp;quot;: {\n  &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;YU%7C%40&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;name&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Updated price&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;formula&amp;quot;: {\n      &amp;quot;expression&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;{{notion:block_property:BtVS:00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000:8994905a-074a-415f-9bcf-d1f8b4fa38e4}}/2&amp;quot;\n  }\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;h4 class=\&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;why-is-this-happening\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-why-is-this-happening\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Why is this happening?&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Why is this happening?\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#why-is-this-happening\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Notion databases allow you to build a fully customizable system for you and your team ‚Äì they provide a place where you can keep all your information in one place, with the ability to build views, filters, and workflows that can be adapted to your needs. &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;The formula property helps you take that even further ‚Äì allowing you to perform calculations, create specialized views, and provide an extra layer of insight based on information in other database properties. It helps expand what you can do in Notion databases.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;We are improving the formulas experience so that: &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;ol&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;It‚Äôs easier to write formulas.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Formula outputs look and feel more native to Notion.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The formula language can fulfill more specific needs.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ol&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Changes being made to the API are to ensure parity with the Notion app. &lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h4 class=\&quot;heading heading-4 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;what-do-you-need-to-do\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-what-do-you-need-to-do\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;What do you need to do?&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to What do you need to do?\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#what-do-you-need-to-do\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h4&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;This is a non-versioned change that will not affect most developers. As mentioned, the formula property format will still have the same schema in the Public API; only the value of the &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;formula.expression&lt;/code&gt; field will change.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Keep an eye on this changelog for when the update becomes available in the Public API.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;july-25---august-7-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-july-25-august-7-2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;July 25 - August 7, 2023&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to July 25 - August 7, 2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#july-25---august-7-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Notion is excited to announce our &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/technology-partner-program\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Technology Partnership Program&lt;/a&gt;. üéâ This program is open to companies who have built a public integration (including Link Previews) and are interested in improving and scaling their integration with Notion‚Äôs support. If you think your integration and company could be a fit, &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/technology-partner-program\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;learn more and apply here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;We‚Äôve updated our API reference docs to include information on Notion‚Äôs &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/help/wikis-and-verified-pages\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;wiki databases and verified pages&lt;/a&gt;. Updates include:\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;An overview on wikis in the guide to &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/working-with-databases#properties\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;working with databases&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/page-property-values#verification\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;verification&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; page property was added to the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/page-property-values\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Page properties&lt;/a&gt; documentation.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/create-a-database\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Create a database&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/post-database-query\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Query a database&lt;/a&gt; endpoint documentation was updated to reflect API changes related to wikis. Namely, that querying wiki databases can return both &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/page\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Page&lt;/a&gt; and &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/database\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Database&lt;/a&gt; objects.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/status-codes#error-codes\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Error codes&lt;/a&gt; section in the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/status-codes\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Status code&lt;/a&gt; page was updated to include examples of the &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;message&amp;quot;&lt;/code&gt; returned with each type of API error, as well as descriptions of the issue each error code represents.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A number of sample cURL commands in our docs were still using an old &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/versioning\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Notion Version&lt;/a&gt; in their headers. These have all been updated.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A clarification was added to the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/authorization#making-api-requests-with-an-internal-integration\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Authorization guide&lt;/a&gt; that the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/versioning\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Notion Version&lt;/a&gt; is always required in public API request headers.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;july-11---july-24-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-july-11-july-24-2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;July 11 - July 24, 2023&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to July 11 - July 24, 2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#july-11---july-24-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A new integration &lt;a href=\&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js/tree/main/examples/parse-text-from-any-block-type\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;example&lt;/a&gt; was added to the Notion SDK for JavaScript repo. This example shows how to get the plain text from any block type currently supported by the public API.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The new unique ID page property was added to the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/page-property-values\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Page properties&lt;/a&gt; documentation. When used, the unique ID (&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;unique_id&lt;/code&gt;) auto-increments for every new page created in a database. An optional prefix can be included that will be applied to the ID values.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;figure&gt;&lt;span aria-label=\&quot;The unique ID in a Notion page&amp;#x27;s properties\&quot; class=\&quot;img lightbox closed\&quot; role=\&quot;button\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=\&quot;lightbox-inner\&quot;&gt;&lt;img alt=\&quot;The unique ID in a Notion page&amp;#x27;s properties\&quot; loading=\&quot;lazy\&quot; src=\&quot;https://files.readme.io/c599280-unique_id.png\&quot; align=\&quot;center\&quot; class=\&quot;\&quot; width=\&quot;600px\&quot; caption=\&quot;\&quot; height=\&quot;auto\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;/&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/span&gt;&lt;figcaption&gt;&lt;p&gt;The unique ID in a Notion page&amp;#x27;s properties&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/figcaption&gt;&lt;/figure&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Workspace Owners can now see &lt;em&gt;all&lt;/em&gt; internal integrations created in a workspace via the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/my-integrations\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;integration dashboard&lt;/a&gt;. This includes integrations created by themselves and other Workspace Owners. We‚Äôve included this information in our &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/getting-started#internal-integrations\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Getting Started&lt;/a&gt; guide.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A &lt;a href=\&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Notion SDK for JavaScript&lt;/a&gt; code sample was added to the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/create-a-database\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Create a database&lt;/a&gt; endpoint documentation.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;june-13---july-10-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-june-13-july-10-2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;June 13 - July 10, 2023&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to June 13 - July 10, 2023\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#june-13---july-10-2023\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;We updated our &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Getting started guide&lt;/a&gt; to help developers who are new to the public API better understand how the API relates to integrations.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/block#embed\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Block object&lt;/a&gt; docs were updated with a tip on how to embed Vimeo links in a Notion page via the API.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A new &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;after&lt;/code&gt; parameter has been added to the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/patch-block-children\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Append block children&lt;/a&gt; endpoint. Developers can now specific where to append a new block, instead of appending it to the end of a parent block by default.\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-curl theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;curl\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;curl -X PATCH https://api.notion.com/v1/blocks/16d8004e-5f6a-42a6-9811-51c22ddada12/children \\\n  -H &amp;#x27;Authorization: Bearer &amp;#x27;&amp;quot;$NOTION_API_KEY&amp;quot;&amp;#x27;&amp;#x27; \\\n  -H &amp;quot;Content-Type: application/json&amp;quot; \\\n  -H &amp;quot;Notion-Version: 2022-06-28&amp;quot; \\\n  --data &amp;#x27;{\n    &amp;quot;children&amp;quot;: [\n    ...\n    }\n  ], after: &amp;quot;&amp;lt;block_id_to_append_after&amp;gt;&amp;quot;\n}&amp;#x27;\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/authorization\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Authorization guide&lt;/a&gt; had a clarification added to help developers find the resources they need for &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/docs/link-previews\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Link Preview&lt;/a&gt; integrations.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;The new &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;public_url&lt;/code&gt; value.\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt;. Previous versions of the API are still supported. Read more about the new version &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/changelog/releasing-notion-version-2022-06-28\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Created a new template repository for getting started with the Notion API and the official SDK. &lt;a href=\&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-typescript-starter\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Find it here.&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Exported many more named types for API response objects in the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;official SDK&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug in the official SDK where some API requests would not work due a capitalization issue. (This was a community-submitted PR; thank you @dvanoni!)&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;july-6-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-july-6-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;July 6, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to July 6, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#july-6-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;releasing-notion-version-2022-06-28\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-releasing-notion-version-2022-06-28\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Releasing Notion-Version 2022-06-28&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Releasing Notion-Version 2022-06-28\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#releasing-notion-version-2022-06-28\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;&lt;strong&gt;Update from August 31, 2022&lt;/strong&gt;: Page properties can now be retrieved using the page, query database, and search endpoints, in addition to the page properties endpoint.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Today we‚Äôre releasing Notion-Version &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt; with the following backwards incompatible changes:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Page properties must be retrieved using the page properties endpoint.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Parents are now always direct parents; a parent field has been added to block.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Database relations have a type of &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;single_property&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;dual_property&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Read more about each of these changes below.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;page-properties-must-be-retrieved-using-the-page-properties-endpoint\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-page-properties-must-be-retrieved-using-the-page-properties-endpoint\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Page properties must be retrieved using the page properties endpoint&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Page properties must be retrieved using the page properties endpoint\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#page-properties-must-be-retrieved-using-the-page-properties-endpoint\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Previously, the &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/page\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;page object&lt;/a&gt; returned from page endpoints, as well as the query database and search endpoint, returned a &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;properties&lt;/code&gt; field that contained all the page‚Äôs properties along with its value:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;Previous Version Response&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;Previous Version Response\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {\n    &amp;quot;Name&amp;quot;: {\n      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;,\n      &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;,\n      &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;: [\n        {\n          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Avocado&amp;quot;,\n            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null\n          },\n          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;\n          },\n          &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;Avocado&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null\n        }\n      ]\n   }\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;While convenient, returning accurate results for all properties resulted in bad performance and timeouts for larger databases or pages with lots of mentions. To combat performance, on March 1st, we &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/property-value-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;added a disclaimer&lt;/a&gt; that page objects stopped returning accurate results for pages with more than 25 mentions to other objects (which affected properties of type &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;title&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;rich_text&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;relation&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;people&lt;/code&gt;, &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;rollup&lt;/code&gt;, and &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;formula&lt;/code&gt;).&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;In October 2021, &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/changelog/retrieve-page-property-values\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;we introduced&lt;/a&gt; a way to more accurately retrieve individual page properties via the &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page-property\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;retrieve a page property item endpoint&lt;/a&gt;. With this endpoint, we‚Äôre able to paginate complex properties that involve additional look-ups.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;With version &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;2022-06-28&lt;/code&gt;, the &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;type&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;property&lt;/code&gt; value from page objects are removed. Thus moving forward, all property value retrieval must happen through the retrieve a page property item endpoint.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;New Version Response&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;New Version Response\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;&amp;quot;properties&amp;quot;: {\n    &amp;quot;Name&amp;quot;: {\n      &amp;quot;id&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;title&amp;quot;\n   }\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;For more examples of how to use the retrieve a page property item endpoint, our &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/page/examples\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;SDK examples&lt;/a&gt; have been updated to use the retrieve a page property item endpoint.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;For more details about why page properties are so complex, we wrote about it in our &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/blog/creating-the-notion-api\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;‚ÄúCreating the Notion API‚Äù&lt;/a&gt; blog post.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;parents-are-now-always-direct-parents-a-parent-field-has-been-added-to-block\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-parents-are-now-always-direct-parents-a-parent-field-has-been-added-to-block\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Parents are now always direct parents; a parent field has been added to block&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Parents are now always direct parents; a parent field has been added to block\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#parents-are-now-always-direct-parents-a-parent-field-has-been-added-to-block\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Previously, when accessing the parent of a database or page, that parent was always either a page, database, or workspace. This is un-faithful to the actual data model of Notion, where the parent may also be another block; for example, you can nest a page under a toggle block.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;The parent field for page and database has been changed so that it is now always the direct parent of that page or database, and a new parent type has been added: &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;block_id&lt;/code&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Additionally, a &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;parent&lt;/code&gt; field has been added to the block object. Together, these changes allow you to fully traverse Notion‚Äôs tree.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;To emulate the previous behavior of retrieving the page, database, or space parent, you may traverse up the tree using the retrieve a block endpoint. If the parent ‚â† one of those types, retrieve the parent block until it is.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Read more about parent types &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/parent-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;database-relations-have-a-type-of-single_property-and-dual_property\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-database-relations-have-a-type-of-single-property-and-dual-property\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Database relations have a type of &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;single_property&lt;/code&gt; and &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;dual_property&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Database relations have a type of \&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#database-relations-have-a-type-of-single_property-and-dual_property\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Relation properties in databases objects now have a type of &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;single_property&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;dual_property&lt;/code&gt;. These can be used to create one way relations between databases as well as two way relations within a database.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;new-version-of-the-javascript-sdk\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-new-version-of-the-java-script-sdk\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;New version of the JavaScript SDK&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to New version of the JavaScript SDK\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#new-version-of-the-javascript-sdk\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Coinciding with all of these changes, we&amp;#x27;ve released a new major version (v2.0.0) of the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://github.com/makenotion/notion-sdk-js\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Notion JavaScript SDK&lt;/a&gt;. To upgrade to this new version, run &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;npm install @notionhq/client@latest&lt;/code&gt; or &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;yarn upgrade --latest @notionhq/client&lt;/code&gt; from within your repository.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;june-20---july-4-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-june-20-july-4-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;June 20 - July 4, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to June 20 - July 4, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#june-20---july-4-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;features-3\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-features\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Features&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Features\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#features-3\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Added limited readonly support for database status properties. Read more about status properties &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/help/guides/status-property-gives-clarity-on-tasks\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Status property values are returned in the &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Retrieve a page&lt;/a&gt; endpoint. See &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/property-value-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Property values&lt;/a&gt; for more information.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Status property configuration is not supported yet. See &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/property-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Property object&lt;/a&gt; for more information.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;bug-fixes\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-bug-fixes\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug Fixes&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Bug Fixes\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#bug-fixes\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Added a validation for adding new rollup properties that prevents creating a rollup of another rollup.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; Over the past six months, we launched link previews with tools like Slack, Trello, Figma, and Asana, allowing users to preview authenticated content in a new structured block. Now, we‚Äôre ready for any developer to build integrations that support link previews in Notion.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;We built link previews to make it easy for users to easily share information in one place using a link. But with a regular link, the information would become automatically stale, making it difficult to share the latest updates among teams. Now, with the new link previews APIs, Notion will let you know when a user pastes a link to a domain you own, let the user authenticate with Notion and your service, and let you unfurl a new link preview block inside Notion.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Learn more about the new link previews APIs &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/page/link-previews-api\&quot; As a result nothing API-specific to share for these 2 weeks, but we&amp;#x27;ve been hard at work improving test coverage and paring down tech debt.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;march-14---27-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-march-14-27-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;March 14 - 27, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to March 14 - 27, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#march-14---27-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;features-5\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-features\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Features&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Features\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#features-5\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;You can now filter databases on the created at and last edited at timestamps, even if they don&amp;#x27;t have a corresponding property of that type. Read more &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/post-database-query-filter#timestamp-filter-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;A &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTTP/Headers/Retry-After\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;Retry-After&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/a&gt; response header is now being sent with rate limited request responses. The value of this field is set as an integer number of seconds (in decimal). Requests made after waiting this minimum amount of time should not be rate limited. Read more about our rate limits &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/request-limits#rate-limits\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-5\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-5\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Stopped throwing an error when rendering property formulas that hadn&amp;#x27;t been set up yet in the &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/retrieve-a-page-property\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Retrieve a page property item&lt;/a&gt; endpoint. These formulas now return &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;null&lt;/code&gt; values.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;march-18-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-march-18-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;March 18, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to March 18, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#march-18-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;query-a-database-endpoint-supports-filtering-by-timestamp\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-query-a-database-endpoint-supports-filtering-by-timestamp\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Query a database endpoint supports filtering by timestamp&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Query a database endpoint supports filtering by timestamp\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#query-a-database-endpoint-supports-filtering-by-timestamp\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;When &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/post-database-query\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;querying a database&lt;/a&gt; using filters, you previously were only able to build filters using properties that were explicitly defined in the database schema. We&amp;#x27;ve added a new type of filter for the created timestamp and last edited timestamp of any page within the database. This means you can filter by these attributes, even if the database doesn&amp;#x27;t have a &amp;quot;Created time&amp;quot; or &amp;quot;Last edited time&amp;quot; &lt;em&gt;property&lt;/em&gt;.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;You can read more about this filter type &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/post-database-query-filter#timestamp-filter-object\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;, but as a preview here is how you would filter by the created timestamp:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;{\n    &amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {\n        &amp;quot;timestamp&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;,\n        &amp;quot;created_time&amp;quot;: {\n          &amp;quot;past_week&amp;quot;: {}\n        }\n    }\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;And here&amp;#x27;s how you would filter by the last edited time:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;{\n    &amp;quot;filter&amp;quot;: {\n        &amp;quot;timestamp&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;,\n        &amp;quot;last_edited_time&amp;quot;: {\n          &amp;quot;after&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;2021-05-10&amp;quot;\n        }\n    }\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Note that you can also use this filter type within a compound filter.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;february-28-2022---march-13-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-february-28-2022-march-13-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;February 28, 2022 - March 13, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to February 28, 2022 - March 13, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#february-28-2022---march-13-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; Read more &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/changelog/created-by-and-last-edited-by-properties-in-block-page-and-database-objects\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Added new ways for admins of Enterprise workspaces to view and control the integrations installed in their workspaces. Read more &lt;a href=\&quot;https://www.notion.so/help/add-and-manage-integrations-with-the-api\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Added more information to paginated responses to make it easier to fetch complete responses for complex property types. Read more &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/pagination\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;here&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-7\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-7\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where pages and databases with archived (i.e. trashed) ancestors would show &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;archived: false&lt;/code&gt;. They now show &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;archived: true&lt;/code&gt; because they are, in fact, archived.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Improved API performance when rendering users who are members in the space. This affects all user, block, and page-related endpoints since users can be mentioned in both page properties and rich text.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Added a message about sharing relevant pages and databases with a bot in the 404 not found error message. We found that this was one of the more common reasons for API users to get a 404 when calling the API.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where bots could be given a more restrictive &amp;quot;Can edit content&amp;quot; access on child databases, which prevented some bots with write access from being able to update the database schema. &lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where user mentions failed with &amp;quot;user not found&amp;quot; when creating new blocks, even if those users should have been visible to the bot.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where malformed properties in a single page would cause an entire request to the query database endpoint to fail.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug where it was possible to update a page/database in the trash. Attempting to update a trashed page or database now returns a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug in the get page property endpoint where retrieving a rollup property which referenced a relation containing pages the bot did not have access to skipped those pages and returned an incorrect result. We now return a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;Fixed a bug in the get page property endpoint where retrieving a formula property whose depth exceeds what we can compute in the API simply returned the wrong value. We now return a validation error.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;/ul&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; The List Databases endpoint only returns explicitly shared databases, while search will also return child pages and databases within explicitly shared pages.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;h2 class=\&quot;heading heading-2 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;january-31-2022---february-13-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-january-31-2022-february-13-2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to January 31, 2022 - February 13, 2022\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#january-31-2022---february-13-2022\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;\n&lt;blockquote class=\&quot;callout callout_info\&quot; theme=\&quot;üìò\&quot;&gt;&lt;h2 class=\&quot;callout-heading\&quot;&gt;&lt;span class=\&quot;callout-icon\&quot;&gt;üìò&lt;/span&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;re trying something new&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/h2&gt;&lt;p&gt;We&amp;#x27;re experimenting with publishing biweekly changelogs in addition to our existing changelogs about new features. The biweekly changelogs will include bug fixes and improvements that are not big enough to justify their own changelog entry.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;p&gt;The timing may be somewhat irregular until we smooth the process out, but we hope to align on a regular schedule soon. This is our first regular changelog entry; we hope you find it useful.&lt;/p&gt;&lt;/blockquote&gt;\n&lt;h3 class=\&quot;heading heading-3 header-scroll\&quot; align=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-anchor anchor waypoint\&quot; id=\&quot;bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;heading-text\&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=\&quot;section-bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor_backwardsCompatibility\&quot;&gt;&lt;/div&gt;Bug fixes and performance improvements&lt;/div&gt;&lt;a aria-label=\&quot;Skip link to Bug fixes and performance improvements\&quot; class=\&quot;heading-anchor-icon fa fa-anchor\&quot; href=\&quot;#bug-fixes-and-performance-improvements-8\&quot;&gt;&lt;/a&gt;&lt;/h3&gt;\n&lt;ul&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;We added an optimization for search when filtering by pages or databases. This should particularly help latency when using search to power a database picker in a large workspace. For more details about search and how to optimize search requests, see the &lt;a href=\&quot;https://developers.notion.com/reference/post-search\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;search documentation&lt;/a&gt;.&lt;/li&gt;\n&lt;li&gt;We fixed an issue where fetching an embed block containing an uploaded file returned the wrong file data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;table_row&lt;/code&gt; whose &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;table_row&lt;/code&gt; children via &lt;a href=\&quot;/reference/get-block-children\&quot; target=\&quot;\&quot; title=\&quot;\&quot;&gt;Retrieve block children&lt;/a&gt;. The &lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang- theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;table&lt;/code&gt; block itself only contains formatting data, no content.&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Table block example:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;{\n\t&amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;table&amp;quot;,\n\t&amp;quot;table&amp;quot;: {\n\t\t&amp;quot;table_width&amp;quot;: 3,\n\t\t&amp;quot;has_column_header&amp;quot;: false,\n\t\t&amp;quot;has_row_header&amp;quot;: false\n\t}\n}\n&lt;/code&gt;&lt;/pre&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;/div&gt;\n&lt;p&gt;Table row block example:&lt;/p&gt;\n&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs CodeTabs_initial theme-light\&quot;&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-toolbar\&quot; role=\&quot;tablist\&quot;&gt;&lt;button aria-selected=\&quot;true\&quot; class=\&quot;CodeTabs_active\&quot; role=\&quot;tab\&quot; type=\&quot;button\&quot;&gt;JSON&lt;/button&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&lt;div class=\&quot;CodeTabs-inner\&quot; role=\&quot;tabpanel\&quot;&gt;&lt;pre&gt;&lt;button aria-label=\&quot;Copy Code\&quot; class=\&quot;rdmd-code-copy fa\&quot;&gt;&lt;/button&gt;&lt;code class=\&quot;rdmd-code lang-json theme-light\&quot; data-lang=\&quot;json\&quot; name=\&quot;\&quot; tabindex=\&quot;0\&quot;&gt;{\n  &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;table_row&amp;quot;,\n  &amp;quot;table_row&amp;quot;: {\n    &amp;quot;cells&amp;quot;: [\n      [\n        {\n          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 1 content&amp;quot;,\n            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null\n          },\n          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;\n          },\n &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 2 content&amp;quot;,\n            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null\n          },\n          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;\n          },\n          &amp;quot;plain_text&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 2 content&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;href&amp;quot;: null\n        }\n      ],\n      [\n        {\n          &amp;quot;type&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;,\n          &amp;quot;text&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;content&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;column 3 content&amp;quot;,\n            &amp;quot;link&amp;quot;: null\n          },\n          &amp;quot;annotations&amp;quot;: {\n            &amp;quot;bold&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;italic&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;strikethrough&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;underline&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;code&amp;quot;: false,\n            &amp;quot;color&amp;quot;: &amp;quot;default&amp;quot;\n          },\n
